channel.title: Paytm Job Postings
channel.description: Job postings for Paytm from lever.co

item.title: Workforce Planning Specialist
item.description:
Buckle up if you’re ready to be our Workforce Planning Specialist. In this role, you shall be responsible for providing HC data for budgeting, monitoring headcount planning vs actual, and analyzing the effectiveness of the manpower in the organization.
Working closely with the PBP and Business Leaders you shall be responsible for a headcount of over 2,500 employees. The folks in the GTF People Business Partner, HR Data Analytics, Finance, and Payroll will be your companions on this ride. Your efforts will band together to enhance the company's operational excellence.

item.title: Vendor Management Analyst
item.description:
About the Role
Vendor Management Team is a centralized function based in Jakarta. It handles Vendor Onboarding and Maintenance process throughout GoTo.

item.title: UX Writer - Merchant Payments
item.description:
About the Role
It is said that good design is good business. As our UX Writer for the Payments Product Design team, you'll dive deep into projects surrounding user experience, translating business goals, technical problems, and research points into impactful words/copy. With your stellar design-thinking, research, and data-driven capabilities, you’ll write for a range of audiences, produce multiple design point-of-views and solutions, conduct small to large research projects, and collaborate with a talented troop of writers and designers within the company.

item.title: UX Writer - GoPay
item.description:
About the Role
It is said that good design is good business. As our UX Writer for the Payments Product Design team, you'll dive deep into projects surrounding user experience, translating business goals, technical problems, and research points into impactful words/copy. With your stellar design-thinking, research, and data-driven capabilities, you’ll write for a range of audiences, produce multiple design point-of-views and solutions, conduct small to large research projects, and collaborate with a talented troop of writers and designers within the company.

item.title: UX Writer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
It is said that good design is good business. As our UX Writer for the Commerce Enablement Product Design team, you'll dive deep into projects surrounding user experience, translating business goals, technical problems, and research points into impactful words/copy. With your stellar design-thinking, research, and data-driven capabilities, you’ll write for a range of audiences, produce multiple design point-of-views and solutions, conduct small to large research projects, and collaborate with a talented troop of writers and designers within the company.

item.title: User Spend Pod Associate
item.description: About the Role As our GoPay User Spend Business Lead, you’ll take the wheel in managing the company’s strategy-to-execution - from consumer research, OKRs, to strategy planning. Working closely with GoTroops from various professional backgrounds, you’ll spearhead GoPay’s development within various industry vertical in Indonesia, bolstering Indonesia’s cashless society while driving user and transaction growth with full P&L ownership.

item.title: Total Rewards Intern
item.description:
About the Role
We are looking for Bachelor's and Master's students who can join us for a 5/6 months internship starting from Aug 2022 to Jan 2023. This internship would provide a great opportunity to shadow and learn the ropes from global C&B subject matter experts with deep functional expertise. Depending on which team you are assigned to, you would get exposure to Compensation Market Benchmarking, Compensation Analytics, Employment Tax, Compensation Operations, Compensation Process Engineering, or Benefits Program design among other varied and interesting C&B topics.

item.title: TechOps Engineer (GoFinance)
item.description:
About the role
As a part of TechDevOPs, you’ll play an important role in setting up the newly established Infrastructure Platform within Gojek’s Financial Services team. Together with several Engineering streams and our third-party partners’ engineers, you’ll deploy and administer cloud-based infrastructure, perform troubleshooting and root cause analysis, and contribute your expertise to the platform’s technical direction and strategic decisions for its infrastructure & architecture. Also there will be extra responsibility of achieving SLA’s in Response time and Resolution time. You have to always keep checking all logged tickets and respond to customers. Reach SLA’s also follow the JSM lifecycle.

item.title: Tax Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
Tax specialist is a centralized function unit for Gojek based in Jakarta that handles any tax related to compliance, day-to-day operation, and audit process.

item.title: Tax Manager
item.description:
About the Role
The tax manager will lead ia centralized function unit for Gojek based in Jakarta that handle any tax related to compliance, day to day operation with some automation and audit process.

item.title: Talent & Leadership Development Lead
item.description: Jump to our rocket ship and fasten your seatbelt now if you’re ready to be a part of an adventurous journey in building the future of the digital economy as Talent & Leadership Development Lead. In this role, you will be an integral player within the Learning & Development Team. Your main mission is to enable talent development in this rocket ship to upgrade and grow their capability at its best! Pretty much you will be playing the Yoda role, you will be responsible to oversee the development of all “Jedi Masters” in our GTF Galaxy. Together with our L&D team, your efforts will band together to boost our rocket ship closer to vision!

item.title: Staff Product Security Engineer
item.description:
About the Role
Strap on your helmet and climb on board if you're ready to be our next Staff Product Security Engineer. You will be part of a journey making path-breaking outcomes that will influence not only your aspirations to lead a career within Information Security but also make an impact on the mission of Gojek. As a part of our Product Security team, you will be independently responsible for the entire lifecycle of security projects or features including security design & development, deployment, implementation, and operations. We at Gojek, believe that Security is EVERYONE's responsibility and you will be holding the reigns to promote and lead "Security by Design" principles at Gojek.

item.title: Sr. QA Engineer - Merchant Experience
item.description:
Roll up your sleeves and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Senior QA Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the GoPay team based in Bangalore, India, that directly oversees Gojek's payment experiences. With knowledge of the general mobile landscape, current user preferences and trends, and emerging technologies in the mobile engineering field, you'll drive end-to-end testing efforts and take the wheel in the development and success of the product within your team. You'll get ample opportunity to flex your automation testing skills, getting us even closer to our goal of creating a seamless app that will transport Gojek to all corners of the globe.
Test Engineers would need to be able to lead and implement the test strategy for manual as well as automation by working closely with the product and engineering group. You would also work on the latest cutting-edge technologies and focusing on Merchant Payments – Experience team.

item.title: Sr. Product Marketing Lead - Selly - 7869
item.description:
About the Role
As a Sr. Product Marketing Lead for the Commerce Enablement team, we are looking for a passionate and impact-driven person that can lead a team and develop a strong marketing strategy that can contribute to a significant impact on the business.

item.title: Sr. Product Manager - Consumer Experience
item.description:
About the Role
As our Sr. Product Manager for the Payments group, you'll manage the Experience & Growth stream. This stream will be part of the Consumer Experience team. As a part of this team, you will need to closely collaborate with research, design, and marketing teams to understand more about users & their spending behaviors. GoPay is competing against payment companies, financial services, and surely cash. It’s important to be on tows to understand changing user behaviors and their needs from their payment providers.
As a Sr. Product Manager, you will identify these needs and will influence teams to work towards solving problems to make GoPay an emerging market leader. Areas that you will be owning are user behavior, analytics, discoverability, growth, and adoption of features all across payments, experimentation and segmentation, and building and governing all our communications channels with our customers.

item.title: Sr. Data Engineer (Streaming & Batching)
item.description:
About the Role
As GoPay is undergoing exponential growth, our data has followed the same growth curve. Thus, as an integral member of the Data Engineering team, you'll be at the epicenter of one of Southeast Asia's most coveted companies, and get to witness and solve the challenges that come with rapid scaling.
As our Data Engineer, you'll work closely with the business team and other data teams to improve the accessibility & reliability of data while leveraging the largest-scale data processing technologies in the world. With your strong product-oriented vision and "Do It Yourself" mindset, you'll build data products that will deliver, model, and curate data for the entire Gojek Payments platform.

item.title: Sr Content Creator Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
As a Content Creator Specialist for Creative Labs creative team, you’ll take the wheel in ideation and executing creative campaigns for Gojek’s Social Media channel. Reporting to Creative Labs Creative Director, you’ll lead the discussion and development of creative ideations amongst various internal stakeholders, and oversee the production process from end-to-end - from its inception, design, development, to execution. You’ll get a front row seat (and get your hands dirty) in running impactful marketing campaigns through marrying business objectives and current trends, driving our beloved products to more corners of the world.

item.title: Software Engineer, Infrastructure Engineering - Gopay
item.description:
About the Role
As our Software Engineer for the Infrastructure Engineering Payments platform, you'll play an integral part in designing solutions for Indonesia’s leading digital payments platform. You’ll spend your time writing elegant, bulletproof code, contributing in critical projects, and participating in designing microservices to further evolve our platforms. With this team, you'll be presented with ample opportunities to tackle challenging problems and build systems from scratch. Your efforts will directly improve the productivity of our engineers, and contribute in redefining the payments ecosystem in Indonesia, bringing wider and more inclusive financial services to the region and beyond.

item.title: Software Engineer Lead (BE) - Merchant Payments - 3872
item.description:
About the Role
Merchant Payment is looking for passionate, entrepreneurial technical leaders with a drive of building scalable applications and teams. In this role you will be responsible for the overall delivery of your team and will interface very closely with business stakeholders and product stakeholders to deliver a cutting edge product aimed at improving customer experience on Payment. A strong sense of prioritization, deep technical expertise along with taking care of growth and development of the team, are essential in this role

item.title: Software Engineer in Test - Mapan
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Software Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the Mapan Product Development team based in Jakarta, Indonesia - a team whose efforts are especially catered to aid lower-income users attain additional income through our platform. You'll maintain product quality pre and post release, and employ TestNG, Selenium, and Appium to bolster and enhance the team's products and deliver best-in-class products. You'll have ample opportunity to employ your technical expertise and clean coding skills to deliver tangible solutions that'll bring a positive socioeconomic impact to all who use our app.

item.title: Software Engineer [iOS] - Gopay
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Software Engineer [iOS]. In this role, you will be an integral player in the GoPay tech team based in Bangalore, India. With knowledge of the general mobile landscape, current users trends and preferences, and emerging technologies within the mobile engineering field, you will work alongside the product management team and cross-functional teams (Product Engineer, DevOps, Data, UX, QA) to improve overall code structure, and develop clear and sustainable iOS software components, and develop robust, well-designed software systems. Most importantly, your efforts will directly ensure our users get quality care and a seamless experience with our products & services.

item.title: Software Engineer (Webdev) - KYC - Payment
item.description:
About the Role
If you're looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team who enjoys building creative solutions for users, look no further. As a Full Stack Engineer for the Payments team, you'll design and implement highly-scalable, fault-tolerant products for a massive network of small, medium and large businesses to process and manage their payment transactions. Your efforts will ensure that our family of Indonesian and Southeast Asian merchant-partners using GoFood and GoPay have seamless and enjoyable transactions, and are better positioned to grow their business, revenue, and profitability. After all, our merchant-partners are the heart of what we do.

item.title: Software Engineer (IOS) - Payments - Gopay
item.description:

With knowledge of the general mobile landscape, current users preferences, and emerging technologies, you will work alongside the product management team and cross-functional teams (Product Engineer, DevOps, Data, UX, QA) to improve overall code structure, and develop clear and sustainable iOS software components, and develop robust, well-designed software systems.

item.title: Software Engineer (Backend) - GoFood
item.description:
About the Role
Roll up your sleeves and climb on board if you're ready to be our next Fullstack Engineer. This role will posit you to be an integral player in the Gojek’s Adtech team based in India & Indonesia. With the knowledge of building scalable applications, current user preferences, and emerging technologies, you will be responsible for designing and managing applications, evolving and boosting productivity for the Ads & Promo Platform team, and delivering a cutting edge product aimed at scaling the volume and vision of Gojek’s ads businesses.

item.title: Software Engineer (Backend) - Data Platform
item.description:
About the role:
We are a data driven company - we take pride in being hypothesis driven; we measure the number of concurrent experiments we run and use experimental results to make product and business decisions. Our experimentation platform, Litmus, has made it possible to run targeted experiments on-demand to guide our super app, driver app product experience and business decisions. We are now in the process of evolving it to the next level through automation at scale, statistical sophistication, reducing experiment rollout time by enabling new methods like A/A Tests, CUPED and building decision ready analytics systems. In this role as our Software Engineer for the Experimentation Team, you will be handed the reins to build A/B tests analytical metric intelligent experimentation platform for Gojek. You will be in charge of automating scalable & intelligent business metric attribution systems, evolving architecture to ingest, pre-aggregate billions of clickstream events, provide real time querying capabilities scanning billions of rows. Working closely with backend engineers, data engineers and data scientists, you will get to contribute to the system that runs meaningful experiments for Gojek. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to provide APIs for Gojek millions of users and driver partners to use.

item.title: Software Engineer (Android) - Payments - Gopay
item.description:
About the Role:
Roll up your sleeves and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Android Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the GoPay team based in Bangalore, India. With knowledge of the general mobile landscape, current user preferences and trends, and emerging technologies in the mobile engineering field, you will work alongside the product management team and cross-functional teams (Product Engineer, DevOps, Data, UX, QA) to improve overall application performance, code structure, and develop robust, well-designed software systems. Your work will directly ensure our users get quality care and a seamless experience with our services.

item.title: Software Engineer (Android) - Driver Platform
item.description:
About the Role
At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Senior Software Engineer for the Driver Platform team, you take the wheel in overseeing Android Engineering at Gojek. Along with owning the entire life cycle of these projects, you will establish and evangelize the best engineering practices for your team to follow. Working closely with product managers, QA engineers, and designers, you will get to build world-class products and meet the technological needs of the Gojek's driver partners, ensuring they get the quality care and service that they deserve.

item.title: Social Media Lead
item.description: About the role: This role reports directly to the Head of Social Media & Digital Content and works closely with the Brand team & other pods to grow various social media channels and manage content production for GoPay marketing activities, leading a team of social media specialists.

item.title: SM, National Merchant Activation
item.description:
About The Role
National Merchant Activation Manager is responsible for planning and managing the overall Merchant Activation Activities with the primary goal of building targeted merchants to have sustainable transactions in the GoPay ecosystem.

item.title: Senior/Lead Golang Developer, Data Management
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our Lead/ Senior Software Engineer - Golang for the Data Engineering team. As Gojek is undergoing exponential growth, our data has followed the same growth curve. Thus, as an integral member of the Data Engineering team, you'll be at the epicenter of one of Southeast Asia's most coveted companies, and get to witness and solve the challenges that come with rapid scaling.
In this role, you'll focus heavily on building and scaling a data platform that enables and delivers reliable, trustworthy, and approachable data to our users, as well as designing, developing, deploying frontend applications with a high sense of ownership. Additionally, you'll devise and manage our entire web infrastructure, and produce innovative solutions that our users will enjoy. Your software will deliver, model, and curate data that powers core data platforms throughout Gojek.

item.title: Senior UI Engineer - Customer Platforms
item.description:
About the Role
Are you interested in building next gen collaboration tools alongside a world class engineering team? Or defining the best platform with a talented troop of engineers? Then, this may be the role for you. As a senior engineer in for the Ticketing Platform team, you’ll drive the internal platform customer experience vision alongside our design and product management team. The product vision is to build tools, processes and products that would integrate gojek’s immensely complex products with customers for support. You would be leading a team that would work with customer support operations to identify the strategy to improve and automate customer support.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer, Infrastructure Engineering - GoPay
item.description:
About the Role
As our Senior Software Engineer for the Infrastructure Engineering Payments platform, you'll play an integral part in designing solutions for Indonesia’s leading digital payments platform. You’ll spend your time writing elegant, bulletproof code, enhancing the platform’s engineering strategy, mentoring a talented troop of engineers, driving critical projects, and designing microservices to further evolve our payments system. With this team, you'll be presented with ample opportunities to tackle challenging problems and build systems from scratch. Your efforts will directly improve the productivity of our engineers, and contribute in redefining the payments ecosystem in Indonesia, bringing wider and more inclusive financial services to the region and beyond.

item.description:
About the Role
At GoToFinancial, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As Software Engineer for the Infrastructure Engineering team, you'll play an integral part in designing solutions for Indonesia’s leading digital payments platform.
You will take the wheel in building, operating, and maintaining our developer & infrastructure platforms and tools - such as: developer portal, developer tools and common libraries to mention a few - empowering our entire engineering team with scale and extensibility in mind. With this team, you will be presented with ample opportunities to tackle challenging problems. Your efforts will directly improve the productivity of our engineers, and contribute in redefining the payments ecosystem in Indonesia, bringing wider and more inclusive financial services to the region and beyond.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer, Data Science Infrastructure
item.description:
About the role
As Nasi Goreng is to the people of Indonesia, engineers are to GoTo Financial: sustaining and nourishing the longevity of our business from the inside out. As our Data Science Engineer, you'll be an integral player within the Data Science Engineering team. You'll ensure our Data Scientists in the various GoToFinancial sub-teams have all the resources they require to achieve their goals. You’ll employ your stellar software engineering skills and expertise in the infrastructure operations field in efforts to productionize their processes. Your work will directly influence the performance of our Machine Learning and Data Science models throughout the company, and help in taking data oriented decisions in different interests of business growth, risk etc.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer, Data Platform
item.description:
About the Role
At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Senior Software Engineer for the Data Engineering team, you’ll take the wheel in overseeing Back-end Engineering at Gojek - designing and developing highly scalable, reliable, maintainable and fault tolerant systems for our Data Engineering team. Along with owning the entire life cycle of these projects, you will establish and evangelize the best engineering practices for your team to follow. Working closely with the data catalog team, data engineers and data scientists, you will get to contribute to the system that runs meaningful experiments for GoJEK. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to provide APIs for GoJEK’s millions of users and driver partners to use.

You will take the wheel in building, operating, and maintaining our developer platform called GoPay.sh - empowering our entire engineering team with scale and extensibility in mind. With this team, you will be presented with ample opportunities to tackle challenging problems. item.description:

You'll work closely with a wide spectrum of engineering teams at Gojek, including the Payments, Transport, and Food streams. With a talented troop of fellow engineers and product managers, you'll build groundbreaking features and systems that scale millions of transactions and handle multiple terabytes of storage. item.title: Senior Risk Analyst
item.description: As our Senior Risk Analyst for the Merchant Platform team, you’ll take the wheel in identifying potential fraud risks that may pose a threat to the company, and developing risk mitigation strategies in our fast-expanding business. You’ll analyze, validate and optimize risk rules in order to deliver on target risk metrics. You’ll also act as a key fraud analyst in conducting deep and thorough analysis to address risk related issues. Your efforts will directly bolster the continuous improvement of our platform integrity aimed at further amplifying users’ trust and perception of Gojek, ensuring a safe platform our users can count on and love to come back to.

item.title: Senior Researcher - Market Research (Quantitative)
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly analytical team, and an opportunity to ensure user insights are at the heart of Gojek driver’s experience, look no further. Fasten your helmet and climb onboard as a Senior Researcher - Market Research Lead for the Driver Platform team. You will be our go-to expert in quantitative research methodology to ensure driver insights are at the heart of our products. You’ll take the wheel in providing key insights to aid the development and execution of product design and overall business strategy. The folks in the product, design, data, and business team will be your companions on this ride. Best yet, you’ll have the opportunity to flex your quantitative, qualitative, and analytical research skills, getting us even closer to build the best platform for our driver partners.

item.title: Senior Product Operations Manager
item.description:
About the role:
We are looking for someone with first-hand experience in defining and scaling complex strategic and operational initiatives to bolster our growth and product development in the Vietnam market. This person should have impeccable communication and interpersonal skills, and a passion for bringing order to chaos through methodical cross-functional alignment and rigorous execution. In this role, you will partner with leadership across the company to refine the needs of our Vietnamese customer base and bridge to our product teams.

item.title: Senior Product Operations Consultant
item.description:
About the Role
Take on specific challenges a Gojek business like Transport, Food or Logistics has, conduct a thorough analysis, and make recommendations. This is a high-ownership role where you are also expected to drive these recommendations to get it done. This role is perfect for someone who enjoys solving strategic problems, building consensus among different groups, and is comfortable with data analysis.

item.title: Senior Product Manager, Data Platform
item.description:
About the Role As a Senior Product Manager for Data Platform involves you to have a pivotal role in enabling internal as well as external use cases on the platform, to ensure that we stay true to our goal of being the most preferred SuperApp for our customers. You will collaborate with leadership and cross-functional partners in driving the conceptual and technical development of data products.
As a key member of the Data Platform Product Management team, you'll collaborate closely with a talented troop of Product Engineers and Design folks, along with various Business, Product, and Analytics stakeholders within Gojek. Your efforts will directly enhance the overall velocity of Gojek's Product and Engineering teams, and shape the strategic direction of Gojek's Data Engineering function.

item.title: Senior Product Manager, Data Platform
item.description:

Your efforts will directly enhance the overall velocity of Gojek's Product and Engineering teams, and shape the strategic direction of Gojek's Data Engineering function. We are open for both Jakarta and Bengaluru locations.

item.title: Senior Product Manager- GoMart
item.description:
About the role:
Gojek is looking for an entrepreneurial product leader to drive the vision, strategy and execution of the next stage in our Convenience & Grocery products. We have built and grown GoMart to be the convenience delivery market leader in Indonesia but competition, the opportunity to innovate and - most important - doing more for our users is driving us to push our product further, faster.
As the Senior Product Manager for GoMart, you will take on a “founder” style role where an obsession for great user experience, thinking big while being hands-on and entrepreneurial spirit guide our path forward. Working together with a set of cross functional leads from Engineering, Design, Marketing, and Business you will craft a product strategy and roadmap that will quickly get a wholly reimagined grocery experience to MVP and beyond.

item.title: Senior Product Manager - Data Platform
item.description:

We are open for both Jakarta and Bengaluru locations.

item.title: Senior Product Engineer - Bills and Pulsa
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Product Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the Digital Inclusion team based in Jakarta, Indonesia - a team behind GoTagihan product in Gojek app. You’ll focus your efforts on designing and implementing products for a massive group of users, improving overall application performance, code structure, and developing robust, well-designed software systems. Your ownership, drive, and passion will help provide for a world-class user experience and heightened stability of our products, and help millions users by making bill payments effortless.

item.title: Senior Product Designer - GoPay
item.description:
About the Role
Product designers provide the user's point of view to the discussions and collaborate with the rest of the product team to ensure that users will end up with the best solution to the issue at hand. With a deep knowledge of how the technology works and interest in how users behave, the best product designers can answer any problem with a combination of well-defined flow, wireframes, information architecture, user journey, and/or storyboard.

item.title: Senior Product Analytics - Merchant Lending (Jakarta Placement)
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team with an opportunity to dive deep into product development/improvement, look no further. As our Product Analyst for Merchant Lending, you will be key in identifying opportunities by digging deeper into the data while understanding the goals & metrics of the business. You will have a range of products that you would support in establishing the data funnels, visualizing them and a key insight provider to enhance them. Working closely with the product, engineering and the growth teams, you’ll shape the nature of our lending products to ensure our merchant partners are able to meet their short-term and long-term financial needs responsibly.

item.title: Senior Product Analytics - Merchant Lending
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team with an opportunity to dive deep into product development/improvement, look no further. Working closely with the product, engineering and the growth teams, you’ll shape the nature of our lending products to ensure our merchant partners are able to meet their short-term and long-term financial needs responsibly.

item.title: Senior Product Analyst - Mapan
item.description:
About the Role
As our Senior Product Analyst, you will play a substantial role in the Product Development Group (PDG) team for the core Mapan products. In this role, you'll get to buy and sell online/offline experiences, knowledge distributions, and community practices via the products you oversee. You'll dive deep into the various metrics & data available across the company, generate insights, run experiments, and create recommendations for the product & business. As one of the few Senior Product talents in the company, your efforts will have a direct influence over our customer's product habits and values, and will roll out products that remove the friction from our users' daily lives.

item.title: Senior Platform Engineer - Containerization
item.description: At the Engineering Platform, Gojek; we are looking for passionate engineers responsible for building scalable PaaS offerings aimed at improving engineering experience for various product groups at Gojek. You will also be developing services, tools and platforms that provide distributed systems abstractions.

item.title: Senior Manager, Merchant Engagement Strategy
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Senior Manager, Merchant Engagement Strategy. As a Senior Manager Merchant Engagement - Strategy, you will take the wheel in defining the segmentation, planning as well as the execution program for millions of unmanaged merchants. You'll be working closely with Region and HQ team to create and improve the engagement strategies for our merchants.

item.title: Senior Manager of Risk Data Science
item.description:
About the Role
As a Sr. Manager of Risk Data Science, you will lead a team of data scientists responsible for risk models which protect GoPay and its customers. You will have the opportunity to work with rich data to derive new intelligence and use various data science techniques. You will drive strategic directions in your data science area and solve some of the most impactful and stimulating business problems in the payments space by partnering with leaders from Risk, product, and engineering. You will work in a fast-paced environment with direct impacts to the business.

item.title: Senior Manager of Investor Relations
item.description:
About the Role
Join an expanding dynamic investor relations team to be our next Manager/Senior Manager, either based in Singapore or Jakarta. The role requires strong research and analytical skills to carry out deep-dive industry/business intelligence screening, fundamental analysis, and benchmarking disclosure with peers. It also requires strong communication skills to passionately engage with the sell-side and buy-side to build trust with capital markets. The new team member will be expected to lead quarterly/annual earnings preparation cycles to assist with smooth execution.

item.title: Senior Lead Internal Communications
item.description:
About the Role
Supporting Head of Internal Comms in actualizing Gojek’s objective of becoming a powerful global brand and world-class workplace through excellent internal communications practices and programs and interdepartmental collaboration that inform and engage employees at all levels.
What success looks like: - Increased employee satisfaction toward Gojek internal communications practices and transparent culture - Improved information intake and engagement - Measurement tools: eNPS score, HR/PAC employee survey, townhall surveys, and focus group discussion results

item.title: Senior iOS Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Team
As our Senior iOS Engineer, you’ll be an integral player on our Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. With a talented team of Product Managers, UI/UX Designers, Testers, Program Managers, and various Engineers, you’ll dive deep into building a POS system for both online and offline functions. By improving the overall code structure, developing clear and sustainable iOS software components, and ensuring robust, well-designed software systems, you’ll ensure our customers are given the most streamlined transaction flows and a reliable centralized payment platform.

item.title: Senior iOS Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Team
As our Senior iOS Engineer, you’ll be an integral player on our Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. With a talented team of Product Managers, UI/UX Designers, Testers, Program Managers, and various Engineers, you’ll dive deep into building a POS system for both online and offline functions. By improving the overall code structure, developing clear and sustainable iOS software components, and ensuring robust, well-designed software systems, you’ll ensure our customers are given the most streamlined transaction flows and a reliable centralized payment platform.

item.title: Senior Information Security Associate
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and a chance to hone in on your InfoSec skills, look no further. As our Information Security Engineer, you will be an instrumental player in the Product Security team. In this role, you will frequently utilize your coding and engineering expertise as a second-line engineer. Along with independently handling product security reviews, you will also perform manual and automated code reviews, conduct software security tests, oversee vulnerability assessments for cloud-based tech stack, and assist in technical documentation and scripting for automating DevSecOps. In our humble opinion, the coolest part of this role is knowing that your work will directly ensure the safety of our Gojek family.

item.title: Senior Fullstack Engineer - Financial Services - Consumer Lending
item.description:
About the Role
If you're looking to hone in on your engineering abilities and work on mission-critical high scalability distributed systems, this may be the job for you. As a Senior Software Engineer, your contributions will be crucial for development of financial products. You will help shape the future of our Consumer Lending products, and more importantly, help millions of users meet their financial needs responsibly.

item.title: Senior Frontend Engineer - Merchant Platform - 7856
item.description:
About the role:
Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our Senior Frontend Engineer. GoBiz Merchant Platform team in Indonesia and India provides solutions for merchants across Indonesia and other southeast Asian countries. The GoBiz merchant platform supports a massive network of small, medium, and large businesses.
The platform delivers a world-class merchant experience through multimodal surfaces on the mobile, web, and open APIs. The teams achieve this through the latest frontend architectures that enable internal product teams like GoFood and GoPay, to deliver rich experiences through the GoBiz surfaces.
The platform provides efficient and effective capabilities for cross-cutting concerns across multiple GoJek teams. Internal teams can hence focus on delivering profound experiences without reinventing capabilities. The platform teams invest in large-scale distributed event-driven systems with cloud-native frameworks to provide high-performance, stable, and operationally efficient systems.

item.description:
About the Team
At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Software Engineer for the Commerce Enablement group, you’ll be part of the team building some of the most critical products for Gojek’s merchant-partners. Working alongside some of the brightest minds in the industry across design, product, and engineering, you’ll focus your efforts on designing and implementing products for a massive network of small, medium and large businesses, improving overall application performance, code structure, and developing robust, well-designed software systems. Your ownership, drive, and passion will help provide for a world-class user experience and heightened stability of our CE products, and directly augment the growth of millions of Southeast Asian merchant-partners.

item.title: Senior Engineering Manager - Transport
item.description:
About the Role
The Transport Engineering team at Gojek is responsible for providing the best-in-class experience to the customers of our ride and car businesses. A stellar team of cross-functional individuals is responsible for delivering top-of-the-line experiences across ordering, payments, navigation, and customer support. This team’s ownership spans technology products catering to millions of our customers across all our operating countries and is responsible for running the show for Gojek’s biggest business lines. We are looking for engineering leaders who have hands-on experience in building highly reliable distributed systems. As a Senior Technical Leader, you will create the vision for and build technical capabilities across backend systems, android, and ios apps. The successful candidate will have influence over the vision, features, and design of the critical systems and data used to drive the business.

item.title: Senior DevOps Engineer - Data Platform
item.description:
About the Role:
Gone are the days of colourless tasks and idle work routines. As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will play a critical role in the Gojek Data Engineering team. With the knowledge of managing and operating highly scalable distributed systems in the cloud, you will be responsible for designing and developing infrastructure as code, standardising operational tools, and evolving the data infrastructure to be more secure, scalable, and resilient. Your efforts will directly improve the productivity of the engineers, and bring observability and reliability to the system. At Gojek, we’re bonded not only by our desire to make people’s lives easier but our shared enthusiasm for technology and the drive to make a social impact.

item.title: Senior Data Warehouse Engineer - GoPay
item.description:
About the Role
At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Data Warehouse Upstream Developer, you’ll be an instrumental cog in GoPay’s Data & BI wheel at Gojek that impacts the company’s analytical data infrastructure. You’ll take the reins in designing, developing, setting up, and managing our data infrastructure - one that needs to operate reliably at scale using a high degree of automation.
You’ll also play an active role in ensuring the data governance policies and tools are implemented and adhered to. Product managers, engineers, BI/analytics, and data scientists will be your companions during this ride. Best yet, you’ll have ample opportunity to flex your data/software engineering and communication skills, helping the team build a large, scalable data engineering platform that'll be utilize company-wide.

item.title: Senior Data Scientist - Risk - Gopay -7898
item.description:
About the Role
As a data scientist in our Risk Data team, you will create data science models which protect GoPay and its customers. You will have the opportunity to work with rich data to derive new intelligence and use various data science techniques. You will partner with Risk, product and engineering stakeholders to identify and solve some of the most impactful and stimulating business problems in the payments space. You will work in a fast-paced environment with direct impacts to the business.

item.title: Senior Data Scientist - Marketplace
item.description:
About the Role
As our Senior Data Scientist, you'll be an integral player in the Marketplace Data Science team based in Bengaluru. With the latest cutting-edge data science tech at your disposal, you'll focus your efforts on bringing our Marketplace systems (i.e. supply, demand, and pricing) to the next level, employing various quantitative techniques such as Machine Learning, Optimization, Simulation, Bayesian Techniques to drive asymmetric values for our businesses at Gojek. You'll be heavily involved in ideation, research, and building prototypes, and the folks in the Data Science Platform will bring your models to production. Your efforts will directly influence the stability and scalability of Gojek's Marketplace stream, and thus to company's top and bottom line as a whole.

item.title: Senior Data Scientist - Marketplace
item.description:

item.description:
About the Role
As a Data Scientist specializing in Computer Vision, you will be solving a variety of practical deep learning and computer vision tasks arising from different businesses in GoTo financial. You should be able to bring a new level of Deep Learning/Computer vision capabilities to the GoPay data science cloud and mobile platform.

item.title: Senior Data Scientist - KYC
item.description:
About the Role
We are looking for an experienced data scientist who can lead a team of multi-displinary data scientists to create models which helps build a trusted KYC system. You will be working as part of the Data Science team at GoPay and will work closely with the business, product, and engineering stakeholders to identify and solve some of the most challenging business problems in the KYC space. You will have the opportunity to work in a fast-paced environment in a highly cross-functional team with business and product stakeholders and leverage our robust data infrastructure.

item.title: Senior Data Scientist - GoPay
item.description:
About The Role
We are looking for a data scientist to join our Data Science team at GoPay - you will create models which help grow the customer base and transactions in GoPay. You will work closely with the business, product and engineering stakeholders to identify and solve some of the most challenging business problems in the payments space. You will have the opportunity to work in a fast-paced environment in a highly cross-functional team and leverage our robust data infrastructure

item.title: Senior Data Engineer (Enterprise BI)
item.description:
About the Role
As our Senior Data Engineer, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the Enterprise BI wheel of Gojek that directly supports the Finance, Accounting, and Tax (FAT) team in automating various processes and providing data required for finance reporting. You’ll focus a bulk of your time on developing and maintaining data automation for financial processes. The Data Warehouse, respective back-end and product, and ITBP finance support teams will be your companions on this ride. You’ll have ample opportunity to flex your SQL and Python programming skills, streamlining and automating various financial operations for the wider team to utilize.

item.title: Senior Data Analyst - Cartography
item.description:
About the role
If you’re a Data Analyst at heart, this role is for you! You will be mining insights from the sea of data, building data products, and designing experiments with the ability to see the real-time impact of your contribution. The work will be focused on solving our map data management, map operations, and map SDK problems across Gojek, diving deep into some of the most challenging analytical problems in Cartography - The Map Experiences team. We have Product Managers, Engineers, Data Scientists and Map Operations teams that are eager to assist you through this journey.

item.title: Senior Copywriter
item.description:
About the Role
As the Copywriter for Creative Labs, you’ll take the wheel to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, and captivate consumers. And you will execute creative copywriting for any campaign executing creative campaigns for Gojek’s vast array of products. Reporting to the Group Head of the Creative stream, You’ll get your hands dirty in executing marketing creatives, marrying insights from user behaviors and trends, and relatable content. However, showing the ability to identify and check in with the managers on the viability of approach options.

item.title: Senior Cloud Infra Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Cloud Infrastructure Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Focusing your efforts on empowering our product engineers to drive their performance to the next level, you’ll take the wheel in ensuring operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, and high availability of the system from an infrastructure point of view. Your infrastructure and standardization designs will not only be implemented for the CE group alone, but throughout the Gojek ecosystem as a whole.

item.title: Senior Cloud Infra Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
In this role, you will be an integral player in the Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Focusing heavily on empowering our product engineers to drive their performance and output to the next level, you’ll take the wheel in ensuring operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, and high availability of the system from an infrastructure point of view.

item.title: Senior Business Intelligence - GoPay
item.description:
About the Role
As a Business Intelligence Analyst, you will be working with the Business and product team on supporting analytics and data products (automated dashboards, reports, alerts, and simulation tools) which will create business impact at scale! You would be helping GoPay at a level of detail that enables the stakeholders to identify and address critical issues and align deliverables according to the Team’s priorities and requirements.

item.title: Senior BI Analyst (Enterprise BI)
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our Senior Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst in our Enterprise BI practice. Based in Jakarta, Indonesia, you'll be an integral player within Gojek’s IT Enterprise Systems team under the CIO Organization.
As our Senior BI Analyst, you’ll be instrumental in the Enterprise BI IT Business Partner (ITBP) wheel of Gojek that directly supports the all Enterprise Functions of Gojek which includes Finance, Accounting, and Tax (FAT), HR, Corporate Planning, MM, Procurement etc. team in automating various processes and providing data required for corporate and financial reporting. You’ll focus a bulk of your time on developing and maintaining data automation for corporate and financial processes. The Data Warehouse, respective back-end and product, and ITBP finance support teams will be your companions on this ride. You’ll have ample opportunity to flex your SQL and Python programming skills, streamlining and automating various corporate planning and financial operations for the wider team to utilize.

You will be reporting to Gojek Account Payable Manager and collaborating closely with GoTo Group Finance & Accounting and Treasury functions.

item.title: Senior Account Manager (Merchant Payment - Offline)
item.description:
About the Role
You will be part of the business & operations team accountable for delivering special projects across Offline Payment products (Gopay & Card). Partnering with Device Management team, Marketing team and Product and Development Teams to execute strategies for highest priority products and solutions, for different segments of the merchant.

item.title: Senior Account Manager - Online Payments
item.description:
About the Role
Sales in Midtrans plays an important role to acquire, execute, and maintain partnerships with the most strategic startup and offline-to-online (O2O) businesses in the company’s portfolio. You will assist the Commercial Department in sales functions, including end-to-end management and executing all partnerships' contractual assets that help drive the company's key business goals.

item.title: Security Engineer-Financial Services Platform
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding Cyber Security Engineer, look no further. As our Security Engineer for GoTo Financial, you’ll take the wheel in building and maintaining our security engineering program and. Along with conducting security engineering, you will be in charge of ensuring security best practices implementation within GoTo Financial's products and infrastructure. Working closely with data and engineering, you will get to provide a secure platform for our merchants, partners, and consumers. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to provide the best protection by having a high standard of information security!

item.title: Sales Support Manager
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your seatbelt and climb aboard if you are ready to be our Sales Support Manager. Based in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam, you will be responsible to support our sales team to cater to Gojek merchants’ onboarding/ offboarding, needs, as well as problem-solve their daily issues. You will work closely with other teams both within the region & in HQ to problem solve onboarding issues (i.e: product teams, HQ sales team, VN Legal team, VN KYB team, etc).

item.title: Sales Strategy Manager - GoPay
item.description:
About the role
Your main objective will be to provide the Nationwide GoPay Sales team with strategy, knowledge, & sales tools that they need, so that they can know how well they are doing in achieving the company targets and how to close the gap.

item.title: Sales Strategy Manager
item.description: As a Sales Strategy Manager, you will contribute to building strategic plans for the Midtrans Sales Team to support growth objectives while strengthening the business core to develop and maintain a competitive advantage.The role will also serve as the proxy for Ops, Marketing, and other functions in Midtrans and GoTo Financial to support better communication, planning, and execution moving forward.

item.title: Sales Strategy and Excellence Head
item.description:
About the Role
As our Sales Strategy & Excellence Head, you will be the north-star of GoPay Sales Team, providing the guidance on where they stand, where they should go, and how to reach their destination. Your main objective will be to provide the Nationwide GoPay Sales team with strategy, knowledge & sales tools that they need, so that they can know how well they are doing in achieving the company targets and how to close the gap.

item.title: Sales Planning Manager - GoPay - #7061
item.description:
About the Role
As our Sales Planning Manager, you will be the key person to provide guidance for the sales team on where they stand and where they should go. Your main objective is to provide the nationwide sales team with the performance data that they need, so that they can know how well they are doing in achieving the company targets and so that they can devise the best strategy to win the market based on the data you provide. You will also be responsible to ensure that there is clear accountability between our merchants and their respective salesperson.

item.title: Sales Excellence Senior Manager
item.description:
About the Role
Sales Excellence functions play a vital role in overseeing and improving the sales support process and implementing sales excellence to provide a wholesome, excellent experience for the merchants and partners in the Online Payments - Sales Department in Midtrans. Your role as the Sales Excellence Senior Manager will be to support the Sales Excellence team, with a primary focus on business process improvement to ensure the best fit with the company, standardizing processes to improve operations capabilities, and reviewing/evaluating and maintaining existing documentation (policies, procedures, process maps) that are consistent, updated and inline with the overall business direction. The function is intended to identify and evaluate gaps and execute improvements towards establishing more efficient day-to-day sales support processes and business processes under the Online Payments - Sales Department. If hired, you will do the document processes (SOPs making) and recommend improvements and evaluate the efficiency of changes made to our business processes. You will also help with socialization and training to ensure policy awareness and implementation across functions in the sales team and related departments or stakeholders. You will directly report to the Head of Sales Excellence in a dynamic, fast-paced environment within a rapidly growing organization.

item.title: Sales & Marketing Head (Medan)
item.description:
About the Role
Roll up your sleeves and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Sales & Marketing Head (District Head) for Medan. As our District Head, you will play a pivotal role in curating and deploying strategies as well as doing analytics at the District and finding local insights. You will work closely with the sales, marketing, operations, and business analyst teams in your day-to-day tasks, and also develop and maintain strong relationships with the government, merchants, associations and various communities. On top of that, you will work collaboratively with all troops in the district as well as collaboration with the Region team to oversee overall operations and ensure strategic implementation including product changes and ensuring that everything that transpires is aligned with Gojek's goals &values.

item.title: Risk Manager - Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
As our Risk Manager for the Merchant Platform team, you’ll take the wheel in identifying potential risks that may pose a threat to the company, and developing risk mitigation strategies in our fast-expanding business. You’ll analyze, validate, and optimize risk-related data to design and implement policies that will deliver target risk metrics while heightening the level of risk awareness within the company. You’ll also act as an advisor for risk-related matters, influencing functional stakeholders to implement other broad risk control strategies in their respective domains. Your efforts will directly bolster the continuous improvement of our platform integrity aimed at further amplifying users’ trust and perception of Gojek, ensuring a safe platform our users can count on and love to come back to.

item.title: Risk Manager - Account,Identity & Abuse - 4994
item.description:
About the Role
We are looking for exceptional fraud risk managers to identify potential fraud risk, develop mitigating strategies in our expanding business especially focused on account identity and verification, account takeover prevention and anti incentive abuse . The role holder will be responsible for delivering on target risk metrics - by analyzing data and implementing risk rules - as well as influencing functional stakeholders to implement other broad risk control strategies.

item.title: Risk Lead - Anti-Scam
item.description:
About the Role
A great opportunity awaits our Consumer Risk Lead who will take the wheel in identifying potential risk breaches and developing risk mitigation strategies in our fast-expanding business. Reporting directly to the Group Head of Risk, you’ll act as the stream's key analyst within the Trust & Anti-scam domains, monitoring risk metrics and rules and developing a holistic approach in implementing risk management strategies. You’ll cultivate an effective risk culture within the organization, influencing functional stakeholders to implement other broad risk control strategies within their domains. Your efforts will directly bolster the continuous improvement of our platform integrity aimed at further amplifying users’ trust and perception of Gojek, ensuring a safe platform our users can count on and love to come back to.

item.title: Risk Analyst - Policy and Process
item.description: As our Risk Analyst for the Merchant Platform team, you’ll take the wheel in identifying potential fraud risks that may pose a threat to the company, and developing risk mitigation strategies in our fast-expanding business. You’ll analyze, validate and optimize risk rules in order to deliver on target risk metrics. You’ll also act as a key fraud analyst in conducting deep and thorough analysis to address risk related issues. Your efforts will directly bolster the continuous improvement of our platform integrity aimed at further amplifying users’ trust and perception of Gojek, ensuring a safe platform our users can count on and love to come back to.

item.title: Risk Analyst - Acct, Identity & Abuse - 4992
item.description:

A great opportunity awaits our Consumer Risk Analyst who will take the wheel in identifying potential risk breaches and developing risk mitigation strategies in our fast-expanding business. Reporting directly to the Group Head of Risk, you’ll act as the stream's key analyst, monitoring risk metrics and rules and developing a holistic approach in implementing risk management strategies. You’ll cultivate an effective risk culture within the organization, influencing functional stakeholders to implement other broad risk control strategies within their domains. Your efforts will directly bolster the continuous improvement of our platform integrity aimed at further amplifying users’ trust and perception of Gojek, ensuring a safe platform our users can count on and love to come back to.

item.title: Risk Analyst
item.description: If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, data-driven team and an opportunity to hone your analytical skills, look no further. As our Risk Analyst, you will analyze data to identify and validate high risk users in the GoTo Financial ecosystem such as GoPay, GoPaylater, GoBiz, Midtrans and Moka, and etc. Armed with data analytics skills in SQL, Python, you will be in charge of investigation of fraud and complaint cases and build analytical tools such as dashboards and SOP to improve the process. Working within the Risk function, you will get to learn about risk analytics and fraud detection and management. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to make Trust and Safety a top priority at GoTo Financial.

item.title: Researcher Lead-Merchant Lending
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our Researcher Lead. In this role, you will be an integral player within the Merchant Lending based in Indonesia. Focusing heavily on driving all research related task, you will communicate your findings to stakeholder , planning and evaluating research project. The folks in the product team will be your companions on this ride. Your efforts will directly influence to build customer centric product development.

item.title: Researcher
item.description:
About the Role
If you are passionate about creating real business impact with the power of insights, you are in for a treat! As our Researcher in the Research & Insights team in Gojek Vietnam, you’ll be the go-to person for market insights, and the voice of our users and driver partners, helping to solve a multitude of business problems. Your main objective is to ensure that good insights get to the right audience, are interpreted the intended way, and are maximizing return on investments for the business. On this ride with us, you can expect the folks from Marketing, Corporate Strategy, Operations, Product Development teams to be your companions on a daily basis. You’ll get ample opportunity to hone your craft in qualitative, quantitative, and analytical research by managing multiple research projects end-to-end.

On top of that, you will act as the functional support to the District Sales Support Admins to help them find solutions to the problems they’re facing, and when required escalate to GTF SM, Sales Support in HQ to close the issues.

item.description:
About the Role
Gojek Central West Java offers an excellent experience for a talented leader to join our Gojek team based at Bandung office. You will be responsible for developing Gojek products by creating and implementing strategic marketing plans across various touch points namely visibility, partnership, and digital to name a few. You will also be responsible for the marketing funnel of Gojek products across the CWJ region aligned with the headquarter initiatives. You will work closely with the CE and cross functional team.

item.title: Red Teamer-Team6 Specialist
item.description:

If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding information security, look no further. As our Red Team Specialist for GoTo Financial, you’ll take the wheel in ensure product security for GoTo Financial. Along with Perform a thorough documentation on how vulnerabilities were exploited, you will be in charge of assist in identifying, tracing and neutralizing the active threats. Working closely with Blue Team, you will get to manage unique security incidents. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to create project with higher degree security assessments.

item.title: QA Engineer - Payments- Gopay
item.description:
About the Role
As our Senior QA Engineer for our GoPay team based in Bangalore, India, you'll take the wheel in overseeing Gojek's payment experiences. With deep knowledge of the general mobile landscape, current user preferences and trends, and emerging technologies in the mobile engineering field, you'll drive end-to-end testing efforts, design new test suites, and execute test cases to enhance the development and success of the product within your team. You'll be part of a fluid, fast-paced, and agile team, where the latest cutting-edge internet and software technologies are at your disposal. Your efforts will enhance the durability and efficiency of automation tests done by the wider Engineering team, getting us even closer to our ultimate goal of creating a seamless app that will transport Gojek to all corners of the globe.

item.title: QA Engineer - Money Management
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our QA Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the Bills and Pulsa team based in Jakarta, Indonesia - a team behind GoTagihan product in Gojek app. Your main objective will be to ​drive​ end-to-end testing efforts and be responsible for​ the​ product within your team. Best yet, you will have the opportunity to flex your automation testing skills, getting us even closer to our ultimate goal of creating a seamless app that will transport Gojek to all corners of the globe.

item.title: Project Management Specialist (Go-Mart)
item.description:
About the Role
They say no man is an island - a notion that holds particularly true for this role. As our Project Management Specialist, you’ll manage multiple exciting projects & business initiatives across GoMart. From creating overall planning, execution, and monitoring. Your efforts will help us improve GoMart’s service performance and ultimately allow us to provide great services because of the delightful experiences to our customers, merchants and driver-partners.

item.title: Product Security Engineer - Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding Product Security, look no further.As our Product Security Engineer for Merchant Platform, you’ll take the wheel in building and maintaining our product security program and. Along with conducting product security, you will be in charge of ensuring security best practices implementation within the Merchant Platform product and infrastructure.
Working closely with data and engineering, you will get to provide a secure platform for our merchants, partners, and consumers. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to provide the best protection by having a high standard of information security.

item.title: Product Security - Internship
item.description:
About the Role
Gojek is looking for talented, highly motivated university students for our Product Security team to help increase the security posture across Gojek. Our future talent will be interns as Information Security. You will wear many hats as you jump into a fast-paced environment and produce results. We value an open culture, like-mindedness & appreciate people from varied security backgrounds and hence we are most willing to work with growth mindset people. You can be part of the journey making path-breaking outcomes that will influence not only your aspirations to lead a career within Information Security but also impact the achievement of Gojek’s mission.

item.title: Product Security - Internship
item.description:
