item.title: Product Researcher-Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
"If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants." – Isaac Newton. To innovate, you need to collaborate and build ideas from one another in order to progress. If you are passionate about learning, collaboration and utilizing knowledge and insights to drive innovation, the role of Merchants Product Research at GoTo Financial may be for you. As a product researcher in GoTo Financial, you will play an instrumental role in building merchant products that inspire growth for its users: entrepreneurs and business operators. Your main objectives will be to plan and execute research projects and present them to stakeholders. Your manager will work with you to develop your skills and knowledge and to ensure the quality of the research. Product managers and designers will be your main companions during this ride. Best yet, you’ll have the opportunity to flex your hybrid of quantitative and qualitative research skills, and drive impact on product decisions as a thinking partner for our stakeholders

item.title: Product Marketing Manager - Money Management (#7481)
item.description:
About the role
This role reports directly to the GoPay Head of PMM Money Management with the goals to build a strong foundation of overall GoPay penetration through liquidity, money transfer, bill payment, investment and digital banking initiatives. This role works closely with Money management cross functional team (business strategy, product, growth, research, analyst, corporate affair, brand, etc) to manage end to end marketing initiatives with the aim of building GoPay to become the hub of users’ money management.

item.title: Product Marketing Manager - GoKasir - 7830
item.description:
About the Role
As a Product Marketing Manager - GoKasir for the Commerce Enablement team, we are looking for a passionate and impact-driven person that can lead a team and develop a strong marketing strategy that can contribute to a significant impact on the business.

item.title: Product Manager 2 - Communication Systems
item.description:
About the Role
When it comes to our customers, communication is the only touchpoint that wins or loses them. Whether it is a notification on the app or a nudge outside of it, the way we communicate orchestrates the action of our users, drivers, and merchant partners. This is where you come in.
As a Product Manager in the Marketing & System Communications Product team, your capabilities will feed into the way we interact with end users across different touchpoints (within the app as well as outside). You will partner with our marketing, CRM, and other core product teams (Transport, Food, Logistics, Groceries) to help solve for customer acquisition, onboarding, engagement, retention, and monetization. But wait! This is not a job for the light-hearted. You will need to be strategic and creative in the way you build platforms and have a high bias for action for landing solutions—and, most importantly, put customers first.
To succeed in this role, you will be helping to shape the overall direction for the team as well as roll up your sleeves to execute key deliverables. You would ensure that product judgments are based on strong sound rigor and in-depth investigation and value data over opinions. You should also know to look beyond the surface level when it comes to data/research and separate wheat from the chaff. You need to have exceptional communication and stakeholder management skills as this role need you to collaborate with, manage expectations of, and align stakeholders across functions.

item.title: Product Manager - Merchant Experience (Internal Tooling)
item.description:
About the Role
In the GoPay ecosystem we deal with 3 primary stakeholders, Customers, Merchants and Payment Providers. In this role you will be working on the internal tooling aspect for Merchants. Which will be working closely with the Ops, Product and Technology teams as well as other stakeholders.
We are looking for a quick-learning, self-driven, and motivated Product Manager who obsesses over merchant problems to define the product vision and build products to scale. You look at every problem with the user’s lens and come up with the most effective and elegant solutions. Working alongside other Product Managers, BI Analysts and Product Engineers we are focused on building newer product flows to help provide the smoothest experience to our Merchants and our internal teams.
As an incumbent of the role, you would be responsible for automating SOPs for critical use cases such as onboarding, dispute management/refunds, settlements and merchant communications.

item.title: Product Designer - Merchant Platform
item.description:
About The Role
Are you someone who's looking to solve problems that matter? Are you someone who thrives on the balance of business goals and users' needs? Are you looking to work with people who see failures as growth opportunities? This opportunity might be for you!
The Merchant Platform team is looking for a Product Designer to join us in our efforts to build the next generation merchant platform. The Merchant Platform team is responsible for the core user experience across the different merchant products like GoBiz app and the GoBiz Dashboard. Product designers provide the user's point of view to the discussions and collaborate with the rest of the product & business team to ensure that users will end up with the best solution to the issue at hand.
You will be part of a team of designers working to simplify and design for complex problem areas of payouts, reporting, merchant onboarding, account & user management. For your assigned problem area you will be responsible for product design and collaborating with others on the team for creating a seamless merchant experience.

item.title: Product Designer - Merchant Payments
item.description:
About the Role
We are looking for a product designer with solid front-end engineering background in your previous role and is familiar with technical documentation to help us on building a centralized documentation center for developers. The ultimate goal of this project is to accelerate partners and the devs community to integrate and seamlessly build payment products on top of our payment platform, which will strategically strengthen our position as a leader in the industry.
You will also be able to take care of more than one product/project to ensure you’re always challenged and developed. As a leader in the payment industry, we are constantly revitalizing our product lineup and innovating.
As an independent product designer, you’ll work closely with the product manager, engineers, writer, researcher, and business team with minimum guidance from the design lead/manager. You’ll provide the user’s point of view to the discussions and collaborate with the rest of the product team to ensure that users will have the best solution to the issue at hand.

item.title: Producer
item.description:
About the Role
It's the role for you who's creative as well as detail-oriented. In this role, you will coordinate and manages many aspects of a video production process from start to finish. In a nutshell, a producer may help with creative direction, setting a budget, writing scripts, organizing logistics, deadlines, and communicating with the team each step of the way.

item.title: Procurement System Support Analyst
item.description:
About the Role
As our Procurement System Support Analyst, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the IT Business Partner (ITBP) wheel of Gojek that directly supports the Procurement and Finance Accounting and Tax (FAT) team in performing their daily activities, providing them with accurate and timely support. You’ll also collaborate with technical support, data analysts, and other stakeholders in handling day-to-day inquiries, providing consultation support, and helping to resolve their respective issues. The support your team provides in the Procurement and FAT platform will guide their decision-making process and steer the trajectory of the company’s business and financial endeavors.

item.title: Procurement Specialist - Offline Marketing
item.description:
About the Role
As our Procurement Specialist in the Marketing Sourcing Category, you’ll be an integral player within the Procurement team based in Jakarta. We oversee all Procurement things related to Marketing and Sourcing Category. Specifically, we do sourcing activities that relates to goods/ services in several categories with nature of procuring Marketing related i.e Above the line and Below the line, knowing about the details of marketing area Online, Offline, Digital Platform, Research and working with cross business units who require the such product/ services nature.

item.title: Principal Technical Architect - Payments
item.description:
About the Role
You will play an essential role in developing products and executing business strategies. You will be working very closely with the business development manager, product manager, and engineers to evaluate 3rd party vendors, available technology choices, conversion of product roadmap into engineering execution plan, selection of technology infrastructure, frameworks and libraries, architect and design technology solutions and work with engineers and quality assurance team for timely quality deliverables.

item.title: Principal Technical Architect - Payments
item.description:
About the Role
You will play an essential role in developing products and executing business strategies. You will be working very closely with the business development manager, product manager, and engineers to evaluate 3rd party vendors, available technology choices, conversion of product roadmap into engineering execution plan, selection of technology infrastructure, frameworks and libraries, architect and design technology solutions and work with engineers and quality assurance team for timely quality deliverables.

item.title: Pricing & Supply Business Analyst, GoFood
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Pricing & Supply Business Analyst. In this role, you will be an integral player in the GoFood Strategy & Planning team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. You'll take full ownership of various pricing and supply levers, including customer pricing, driver pricing, incentives, and allocation, devising and implementing pricing & supply enhancements with cross-functional teams along the way. You'll have a direct impact on the trajectory of GoFood's growth and profitability, ensuring the business maintains its market leadership in Indonesia and beyond.

item.title: PPGR Transport Manager
item.description:
About the Role
This position will lead the advocacy for transport and logistics products to the key stakeholders and policymakers from various ministries. The role also serves as an internal advocate that ensures that the Transport and Logistic team can mitigate regulatory and policy risk. On top of that, the role will drive Gojek to expand networks through collaboration and partnerships. Your efforts will ensure that Gojek maintains its commitment towards the government, driver-partners, and industry associations.

item.title: PPGR Corporate Manager
item.description:
About the Role
As a PPGR Corporate Manager, you will help shape public policies that affect GoTo and its group of companies through engagement with the government and relevant stakeholders. Your understanding of how business operates combined with your experience in navigating and managing policy issues and ability to build and nurture government relations will support the PPRG team in addressing challenges that include business competition, merger and acquisitions and taxation. To this end, you will have to work with various government agencies, non-profit groups and other institutions while coordinating with internal business teams to ensure alignment. Your work will impact GoTo’s growth through greater public policy awareness among its important stakeholders.

item.title: Performance Executive - People and Culture
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re located at Jakarta or India, and looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding planning, design and delivery of the performance and promotion program across Gojek, look no further. As our Performance Executive, you’ll take the wheel in turning the data output from the program into insight to enable us to grow and develop the performance of all our people. This role is pivotal to the smooth running and success of this team and work on a broad variety of areas within the small team including communication, data analysis and basic project coordination.
Along with design and deliver communications from the PAC Performance team to employees at all levels and across/within PAC, you will ensure Gojek employees & cross-functional PAC stakeholders are familiar with the overall mission and vision of the P&A team and receive timely updates about the format, process, timelines, and policies related to a performance review cycle. Working closely with PAC Data team, you will get to you will be in charge of help support the team to analyze performance data and transform data into readable, goal-driven reports for continued innovation and growth and to enhance the impact of performance review cycles. The cherry on top: you’ll be project coordinator for the program and play a key role in the execution of the Performance Cycle plans, and will help keep performance plans on schedule working toward high efficiencies and flawless execution.

item.title: People Operations Lead
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and come aboard if you’re ready to be our People Operations Lead. In this role, you will be an integral player within the People Operations team based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We are looking for an individual who excels working in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, is result-oriented, is eager to develop themself, eager to champion various HR initiatives for GoTroops in Vietnam and global markets, and passionate about providing delight to employee experience. This role handles the end-to-end People Operations activities and streamlines HR processes to optimize workflow efficiency, effectiveness, and productivity.

item.title: People Business Partner (Commercial & Regional)
item.description:
About the Role
As our People Business Partner in the Commercial and Regional teams, you'll partner with various business leads within the company to gather insights about and devise effective strategies to resolve people-related issues, achieve business objectives with maximum productivity, and design integrated, meaningful, and enjoyable people experiences in the region. You’ll dive deep into understanding our ecosystem of driver-partners, merchant-partners, and users in Indonesia, and you will drive strategic problem-solving in numerous people areas.

item.title: People Business Partner - India Based
item.description:
About the Role
As our People Business Partner, you'll be a seasoned and strategic People and Culture (PAC) thought partner to our Gojek Engineering team. Like a superhero, you'll trade between business imperatives and the needs of our GoTroops, contributing hands-on efforts at the strategic level in partnership with relevant client groups, mostly at the executive rank and above. This is an individual contributor role. You'll get ample opportunity to work on a variety of global projects, acting as a thought-leader by sharing your knowledge, experience, and people-related best practices among the broader PAC team across the Gojek ecosystem.

item.title: People Business Partner
item.description:
About the Role
As our People Business Partner, you'll be a seasoned and strategic People and Culture (PAC) thought partner to our Financial Services team. Like a superhero, you'll trade between business imperatives and the needs of our GoTroops, contributing hands-on efforts at the strategic level in partnership with relevant client groups, mostly at the executive rank and above. Starting as an individual contributor, your role may evolve into leading a team of one or more People Business Partners down the road. You'll get ample opportunity to work on a variety of global projects, acting as a thought-leader by sharing your knowledge, experience, and people-related best practices among the broader PAC team across the Gojek ecosystem.

item.title: Payroll Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and come aboard if you’re ready to be our Payroll Specialist. In this role, you will be an integral player within the People Operations team based in Bangalore, India. We are looking for an individual who excels working in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, is result-oriented, is eager to develop him/herself, eager to champion various HR initiatives for GoTroops in India and global markets, and passionate in providing delight to employee experience. This role handles the end-to-end payroll activities and involves streamlining of HR processes to optimize workflow efficiency, effectiveness, and productivity.

item.title: Merchant Event & Community Intern
item.description: Gone are the days of colorless tasks and idle work routines. As Merchant Event and Community Intern, you will be a remarkable player in our hyper growing solutions for SME’s, GoKasir. Focusing heavily on the education and engagement roles, you will operate offline/online events, moderate contents through community channels, and reporting the impact in efforts to empowering our Mitra Usaha.

item.title: Merchant Engagement Specialist - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
As part of the Merchant Engagement team, you will be focusing on providing the best customer experience to all non-AM Merchants during their journey in Moka POS and GoStore. To strive and succeed, you are expected to support & provide the best solution for merchants if they face any issues. Thus, you need to have extremely strong product knowledge, communication, sales & negotiation skills, and the ability to help merchants to solve issues are imperative to becoming a successful Merchant Engagement Specialist.

item.title: Merchant Engagement Lead - 7492
item.description:
About the Role
As part of the Merchant Engagement team, you will be a crucial figure of the merchant lifecycle in driving engagement strategies & execution initiatives throughout our Non-AM merchants journey. As the Merchant Engagement (ME) Lead, you will work with a passionate team of agents to innovatively improve merchants’ engagement & assist them towards achieving business growth.

item.title: Manager, Product Management, Sanctions Platform-Payment Platform
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to hone your product management skills, look no further. As a PM for Sanctions platform you will be responsible for building state of the art products/platforms that allows Gopay to fight fraud and make our products safe and trustworthy for our customers. You will be working with seasoned risk leaders, data scientists, and business stakeholders in driving the Ml driven new age risk mitigation solutions for payments business. Your efforts will help position Gopay as the most trusted payment method for customers and merchant partners.

item.title: Manager, Product Management, KYC platform - Payments Platform
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to create massive impact, look no further. In this role you will be responsible for creating OneKYC platform in GoTo that allows us to verify real identities of our customers and help us build trust with them and give them seamless access to vast use cases related to payments and financial services. OneKYC platform will not be limited to Payments & GTF but also wider use-cases in GoTo across customers and merchants. You will be working with teams in Indonesia, India & Singapore including Data, Compliance and Regulations, Business and other Product units in GoTo that leverage the capabilities of the platform and help shape the future roadmap.

item.title: Manager, Product Management - Consumer Lending
item.description:
About the role
You’ll take the wheel in building lending products for consumers across the GoTo ecosystem. Along with overseeing product development processes that are used by Own personal OKRs and understand the team, you will be in charge of delivering scoped features with guidance from Head of Product. Working closely with the engineering and design team, you’ll shape the nature of our lending products to ensure our customers are able to meet their short-term and long-term financial needs responsibly.

item.title: Manager, Product Management - Consumer Lending
item.description:
About the role
You’ll take the wheel in building lending products for consumers across the GoTo ecosystem. Along with overseeing product development processes that are used by Own personal OKRs and understand the team, you will be in charge of delivering scoped features with guidance from Head of Product. Working closely with the engineering and design team, you’ll shape the nature of our lending products to ensure our customers are able to meet their short-term and long-term financial needs responsibly.

item.title: Legal Supervisor
item.description:
About the Role
A great opportunity awaits our Legal Supervisor who will represent Gojek and the Legal Team for a majority of its legal and business advisory. Together with the Product Legal Stream, you’ll run points for all legal matters that are related to all Gojek’s on demand business streams, primarily Food, Transport, Commercial and Merchants.
You will also manage other pivotal streams, international projects and other initiatives that are demanded by Gojek’s business. In view of our recent merger with Tokopedia, this position will play a pivotal role in the integration and product development and other commercial initiatives as well. As part of the award-winning legal team, you will be involved in various legal tech related works such as drafting commercial contracts and providing legal advice on various product development by the business team.

item.title: Lead Software Engineer, Machine Learning Operations - GoFood
item.description:
About the Role
Don your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our Machine Learning Engineer. In this role, you will get to design and build Gojek's machine learning infrastructure and platform. Your efforts will be critical in ensuring rapid and reliable Machine Learning products and functionality for our consumer app and behind-the-scenes efficiency. In our humble opinion, the coolest part of this role is that your work will directly influence the production quality systems at all stages of the Machine Learning lifecycle for Gojek.

item.title: Lead Software Engineer (Fullstack) - Data Engineering
item.description:
About the role:
You will be the part of the Data Engineering Frontend team responsible for building the next-gen self-serve console portal, since most of Gojek internally relies on it, hence the responsibility increases to provide high-quality products.

item.title: Lead Software Engineer - Data Engineering
item.description:
About the Role
At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Lead Software Engineer for the Data Engineering team, you’ll take the wheel in overseeing Back-end Engineering at Gojek - designing and developing highly scalable, reliable, maintainable and fault tolerant systems for our Data Engineering team. Along with owning the entire life cycle of these projects, you will establish and evangelize the best engineering practices for your team to follow. Working closely with the data catalog team, data engineers and data scientists, you will get to contribute to the system that runs meaningful experiments for GoJEK. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to provide APIs for GoJEK’s millions of users and driver partners to use.

item.title: Lead Software Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Senior Software Engineer for the Commerce Enablement group, you’ll be part of the team building some of the most critical products for Gojek’s merchant-partners. Working alongside some of the brightest minds in the industry across design, product, and engineering, you’ll focus your efforts on designing and implementing products for a massive network of small, medium and large businesses, improving overall application performance, code structure, and developing robust, well-designed software systems. Your ownership, drive, and passion will help provide for a world-class user experience and heightened stability of our CE products, and directly augment the growth of millions of Southeast Asian merchant-partners.

item.title: Lead Product Manager, Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
Every business revolves around money, as it is one of the most important parts in business. As our PM on Financials based in Jakarta, you’ll manage products that facilitate all payment transactions that are to be settled to merchants. The scale will be upwards of a million transactions on a daily basis and the key products that you will be managing would include the merchant wallet, calculation and deduction engines. These products form the backbone of the Merchant Platform and are critical for Gojek's ability to monetize from merchants. You will be responsible for building the roadmap and vision around how to scale the work of our merchant finance team that enables us to grow. The folks in the engineering, business, design, and research team(s) will be your companions on this ride. Your efforts will directly influence the happiness, stickiness and trust of merchants on our platform and for other product groups in Gojek, these products will be invaluable to drive their monetization and revenue realization efforts.

item.title: Lead Product Manager - Merchant Experience
item.description:
About the Role
In the GoPay ecosystem we deal with 3 primary stakeholders, Customers, Merchants and Payment Providers. In this role you will be working on the Merchant Experience charter, which is part of the Merchant Payments vertical in the company.
We are looking for a quick-learning, self-driven, and motivated Product Manager who obsesses over merchant problems to define the product vision and build products to scale. You look at every problem with the user’s lens and come up with the most effective and elegant solutions. Working alongside other Product Managers, Designers, Researchers, BI Analysts and Engineers we are focused on building newer product flows to help provide the smoothest experience to our Merchants.
As an incumbent of the role, you would be responsible for leading with a close sense of the merchant’s voice and crafting solutions which aim to solve their pain-points.

item.title: Lead of Savings - Money Management #6560
item.description: About This Role : As part of Money Management POD focusing on Savings, you will play an important role in setting the strategy & growth plan of the POD. You’ll take the wheel in managing the POD’s strategy-to-execution - from consumer research, OKRs, to strategy planning to create the most impactful business solutions for our users and strategic partners, steer the strategy and delivery of growth targets for the team responsible for allowing a customer to manage their money and linked sources of money. This would include the linked accounts, balances, digital account openings, history, categorisation of expenses, insights and actionable recommendations, default in/out channels for payments. Throughout this exciting experience, you’ll build relationships with internal and external stakeholders, from product, marketing, research, and operation team among others to meet the fast-paced nature of the financial technology industry.

item.title: Lead IT Auditor
item.description:
About the Role
In GoTo, the growth of our business is continuously challenged by the fast pace of technology development and regulatory changes. As the IT Audit Lead, you will be a valued member of the Internal Audit Function with broad discretion in developing a strong foundational technology assurance framework. You will grow both technically and professionally through interaction with one of the most dynamic and driven management teams, exposure to the latest technologies, and observe firsthand on tech-enabled business strategy.

item.title: Lead iOS Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
As our Lead iOS Individual Contributor, you’ll be an integral player on our Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. With a talented team of Product Managers, UI/UX Designers, Testers, Program Managers, and various Engineers, you’ll dive deep into building a POS system for both online and offline functions. By improving the overall code structure, developing clear and sustainable iOS software components, and ensuring robust, well-designed software systems, you’ll ensure our customers are given the most streamlined transaction flows and a reliable centralized payment platform.

item.title: Lead iOS Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
As our Lead iOS Individual Contributor, you’ll be an integral player on our Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. With a talented team of Product Managers, UI/UX Designers, Testers, Program Managers, and various Engineers, you’ll dive deep into building a POS system for both online and offline functions. By improving the overall code structure, developing clear and sustainable iOS software components, and ensuring robust, well-designed software systems, you’ll ensure our customers are given the most streamlined transaction flows and a reliable centralized payment platform.

item.title: Lead Growth Analyst - Financial Services
item.description: As a Lead Growth Analyst on the Financial Services Platform, you will be responsible to utilize our voluminous data to improve acquisition, activation, retention, and loyalty for our Financial Services products. You will be driving the analytics projects of the Growth team across different products, ultimately enabling the Financial Services team to make data-driven decisions. You will have ample opportunity to flex your analytics and project management skills, getting us even closer to the financial inclusion of all Indonesian. You will be based in the Jakarta office.

item.title: Lead Frontend Engineer - Merchant Platform - 7854
item.description:
About the role: Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our Lead Frontend Engineer. GoBiz Merchant Platform team in Indonesia and India provides solutions for merchants across Indonesia and other southeast Asian countries. The GoBiz merchant platform supports a massive network of small, medium, and large businesses.
The platform delivers a world-class merchant experience through multimodal surfaces on the mobile, web, and open APIs. The teams achieve this through the latest frontend architectures that enable internal product teams like GoFood and GoPay, to deliver rich experiences through the GoBiz surfaces.
The platform provides efficient and effective capabilities for cross-cutting concerns across multiple GoJek teams. Internal teams can hence focus on delivering profound experiences without reinventing capabilities. The platform teams invest in large-scale distributed event-driven systems with cloud-native frameworks to provide high-performance, stable, and operationally efficient systems.

item.title: Lead Data Governance - GoFinance
item.description:
About the Role
In this role, you will act as a bridge between the business intelligence team, software engineering team, product team, compliance team, and legal team to help enable the stakeholders to accurately make data-driven decisions while implementing proper data security and protection principles. Through this role you will be able to flex your data analytical skills, communication and leadership skills, and greatly contribute to securing data within the Gojek ecosystem. Along the way, you will have the opportunity to collaborate with multiple people with different backgrounds, so you will be exposed to different perspectives.

item.title: Lead Data Engineer-Streaming
item.description:
About the Role
As Gojek is undergoing exponential growth, our data has followed the same growth curve. Thus, as an integral member of the Data Engineering team, you'll be at the epicenter of one of Southeast Asia's most coveted companies, and get to witness and solve the challenges that come with rapid scaling.
As our Lead Data Engineer, you'll work closely with the business team and other data teams to improve the accessibility & reliability of data while leveraging the largest-scale data processing technologies in the world. With your strong product-oriented vision and "Do It Yourself" mindset, you'll build data products that will deliver, model, and curate data for the entire Gojek ecosystem.

item.title: Lead Data Engineer - Infrastructure
item.description:
About the Role - As GoPay is undergoing exponential growth, our data has followed the same growth curve. Thus, as an integral member of the Data Engineering team, you'll be at the epicenter of one of Southeast Asia's most coveted companies, and get to witness and solve the challenges that come with rapid scaling.
As our Data Engineer- Infrastructure for our Payments team, you'll focus heavily on building and scaling a data platform that enables and delivers reliable, trustworthy, and approachable data to our users. You'll also get to design, develop, and deploy applications with a high sense of ownership. The core data platforms you’ll build will deliver, model, and curate data for the entire Gojek Payments platform.

item.title: Lead Data Engineer
item.description: About the Role As our Lead Data Engineer, you’ll be a crucial member of the Financial Services Platform at Gojek. In this role, you’ll take the wheel in building and scaling our Data Warehouse foundation that enables and delivers reliable and trustworthy data that affects our internal users, driver-partners, and merchant-partners alike. You’ll design, develop, and maintain the services for our data ingestion pipeline, ensuring the data is understandable, usable, and adheres to data governance policies. The folks in the Engineering, Business, Operations, and Data Science teams will be your companions on this ride; they’ll provide the data you’ll utilize in your daily tasks, while you act as a bridge between them and third parties.

item.title: Lead Data Analyst - Financial Services
item.description:
About the Role
As a Lead Data Analyst on the Financial Services Platform, you will be responsible to utilize our voluminous data to improve acquisition, activation, retention, and loyalty for our product. You will be driving the analytics projects of the Growth team across different products, ultimately enabling the Financial Services team to make data-driven decisions.

item.title: Lead Cloud Infra Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Cloud Infrastructure Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Focusing heavily on empowering our product engineers to drive their performance and output to the next level, you’ll take the wheel in ensuring operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, and high availability of the system from an infrastructure point of view. Your infrastructure and standardization designs will not only be implemented for the CE group alone, but throughout the Gojek ecosystem as a whole.

item.title: Lead BI Analyst (Enterprise BI)
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our Lead Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst in our Enterprise BI practice. Based in Jakarta, Indonesia, you'll be an integral player within Gojek’s IT Enterprise Systems team under the CIO Organization.
As our Lead BI Analyst, you’ll be instrumental in the Enterprise BI IT Business Partner (ITBP) wheel of Gojek that directly supports the all Enterprise Functions of Gojek which includes Finance, Accounting, and Tax (FAT), HR, Corporate Planning, MM, Procurement etc. team in automating various processes and providing data required for corporate and financial reporting. You’ll focus a bulk of your time on developing and maintaining data automation for corporate and financial processes. The Data Warehouse, respective back-end and product, and ITBP finance support teams will be your companions on this ride. You’ll have ample opportunity to flex your SQL and Python programming skills, streamlining and automating various corporate planning and financial operations for the wider team to utilize.

item.title: Lead Android Engineer - Gopay
item.description:
About the Role
Roll up your sleeves and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Lead Android Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the GoPay team based in Bangalore, India. With knowledge of the general mobile landscape, current user preferences and trends, and emerging technologies in the mobile engineering field, you will work alongside the product management team and cross-functional teams (Product Engineer, DevOps, Data, UX, QA) to improve overall application performance, code structure, and develop robust, well-designed software systems. Most importantly, your efforts will directly ensure our users get quality care and a seamless experience with our products & services.

item.title: Lead Android Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
At Goto, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Lead Android Engineer, you’ll be an integral player on our Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. With a talented team of Product Managers, UI/UX Designers, Testers, Program Managers, and various Engineers, you’ll dive deep into building a POS system for both online and offline functions. By improving the overall code structure, developing clear and sustainable Android software components, and ensuring robust, well-designed software systems, you’ll ensure our customers are given the most streamlined transaction flows and a reliable centralized payment platform.

item.title: KYCC SME #6552
item.description: About the Role - In this role you would provide advisory support to the teams so that KYC is performed in an efficient, accurate and professional manner, and in accordance with relevant policies. You also would analyze customer complaints and identify actions to improve service. To promulgate good complaint handling techniques across the business, you will play a critical role through the delivery of skilled technical and analytical support, enabling the business to maintain customer satisfaction and meet regulatory policy standards.

item.title: KYC Special Project - GoPay - #7510
item.description:
About the Role
As our KYC Project Manager, you’ll be part of the greater KYC verifications team that directly impacts Gojek’s partners. Your main objective will be to lead projects that further enhance KYC processes contributing to measurable benefits for the team's operations. You’ll help identify gaps in our current operational processes, come up with automated solutions to resolve these issues, and review their subsequent results. The main KYC streams, as well as the Product and QC teams, will be your companions on this ride. Your efforts will directly ensure the KYC team operates with great efficiency, reducing manual processes across all KYC functions and facilitating seamless new product deployment.

item.title: KYC Project Manager
item.description: They say no man is an island, and this notion holds particularly true for this role. As our KYC Project Manager, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the verifications wheel of GoJek that directly impacts the company’s ability to ensure its adherence to implementing a robust Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) and Customer Due Diligence (CDD) in compliance to regulation. You will be in the driver seat to translate company goals into initiatives with tangible result by doing cost and benefit analysis

item.title: KYC Ops Manager
item.description: They say no man is an island, and this notion holds particularly true for this role. As our KYC Ops Manager, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the verifications wheel of Gojek that directly impacts the company’s ability to ensure its adherence to implementing a robust Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) and Customer Due Diligence (CDD) in compliance to regulation. Your main objective will be to ensure that existing processes meet the standard requirements such as targeted SLA and KYC quality as well as identify ways to better streamline current processes. The greater KYC, Product, and Compliance teams will be your companions during this ride. Best yet, you’ll have the opportunity to flex your leadership and team management skills, getting us even closer to a seamless KYC Ops process

item.title: KYB Ops Manager
item.description: They say no man is an island, and this notion holds particularly true for this role.
