item.title: IT Procurement Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
Vendor Management Team is centralized function unit based in Jakarta that handle Vendor Onboarding and Vendor Maintenance process throughout Gojek entities.

item.title: IT GRC Specialist-Financial Services Platform
item.description:
About the Role
As our IT GRC Specialist (Governance, Risk & Compliance), you'll be a crucial cog within the Financial Platform wheel at GoTo Financial. You'll be the key person who'll build and maintain our IT GRC program, as well as oversee the implementation of its controls. You'll dive deep into conducting IT GRC assessments, including legislative and regulatory proposals surrounding personal information, and constantly scout for any gaps in our system to prevent system & data leaks. Your efforts will ensure the privacy and safety of our users and partners are protected and upheld, providing anyone who utilizes our financial platform the best protection through world-class IT GRC programs and processes.

item.title: IT GRC Lead-Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding Information Security, look no further.As our IT GRC Lead for Merchant Platform, you’ll take the wheel in leading the team of a high performing team of IT GRC Specialists in developing and maintaining Information and security management policies for Goto Financial. Along with conducting security risk, you will be in charge of monitoring, evaluating, and enforcing the implementation of information security controls throughout the company. Working closely with data and engineering, you will get to provide a secure platform for our merchants, partners, and consumers. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to provide the best protection by having a high standard of information security

item.title: IT Enterprise Risk Management Lead
item.description:
About the Role
As our IT ERM Lead, you'll be responsible for overseeing the overall IT Risk Management process including monitoring internal and external reporting procedures of risk metrics and creating actionable insights for various Risk teams. You’ll develop a rigorous IT risk management reporting program for the Risk Management Committee and Audit Committee.
Working closely with Operating company ERM teams and IT GRC Teams on key material risks and mitigations specifically for IT and Cyber Risks, you'll also manage the aggregation of the Risk at the GoTo level, and cultivate risk management culture centered around trust and confidence amongst external stakeholders. This role is exciting as you will be interfacing with dynamic, ambitious, and result-driven individuals that are focused on improvements. Join us in a race to provide a safe and trusted platform that our customers count on and love to come back to.

item.title: Internal Controls & Compliance Manager - 5484
item.description:
About the Role
As Internal Controls & Compliance manager, you are responsible for the operationalisation of corporate compliance programs for GoTo Financial. You will focus on performing regular corporate compliance risk assessment, implementing group compliance policies and standards, ensuring the establishment of relevant standard operating procedures, and building the ethics & compliance culture through effective communication program/strategy and compliance testing/monitoring activities.
Essentially, you will be part of the team who protect the company, manage risk related to the GoTo Financial ecosystem by ensuring rigorous processes and policy is in place to meet regulatory and shareholders expectations, align the business activities with the company code of conduct, group policies and international standards of good practices.

item.title: Internal Communications Lead
item.description: About the Role Supporting Senior Manager of Internal Comms in actualizing Gojek’s objective of being a great place to work through excellent internal communications practices and programs and interdepartmental collaboration that create trust and inform and engage employees at all levelsWhat success looks like:Increased employee trust and satisfaction toward Gojek internal communications practices and transparent cultureImproved information intake and engagementMeasurement tools: HR/PAC employee survey, townhall surveys, and focus group discussion results, others

item.title: Interaction Designer - GoPay
item.description:
About the role
As an Interaction Designer, you will craft user-centric products and experiences, into - functional - intuitive and beautiful interfaces as well as micro-interactions. You will collaborate with Developers, Product Designers, UX writers, Researchers, & Creatives in an agile team environment. You will deliberate design decisions and translate any given user-experience journey into a smooth and intuitive interaction.
We are looking for Interaction Designers who have a deep understanding of how computers and humans interact, master the design fundamentals such as color, space, typography, hierarchy, and paddings and grids like the back of your hands. You have to be familiar with the platform that you are building (iOS, Android, Web, etc.) — sticklers for details, understanding design systems and how it works at scale, and expertise over their tools.
You will be a part of the key players who help us build the best and biggest payment platform in Indonesia.

item.title: Insurance - Software Engineer - SE2
item.description:
About the Role
If you're looking to hone in on your engineering abilities and work on mission-critical high scalability distributed systems, this may be the job for you. As a Software Engineer, you will help shape the future of our Consumer Lending products, and more importantly, help millions of users meet their financial needs responsibly.
Be a part of feature development from end-to-end, constantly pairing with Senior Engineers. Write code that's clear, concise, performant, tested, and easy to understand by other teams and engineers. Contribute to the design and development of highly scalable, available, reliable, secure, and fault-tolerant services. Try questioning engineering standards, tooling, and processes after understanding our needs and communicate what works and what does not work for you and why. Deep dive and debug production issues across services and levels of the stack when needed. Coordinate and communicate with different internal/external teams daily—stay in close communication with product manager, team lead and senior engineers to execute the feature roadmap efficiently.

item.title: Insights Assistant Manager
item.description:
About the Role
As Insights Assistant Manager, you will help Insights Manager to provide actionable insights and strategies to reach target acquisitions and monthly transacting users. Working closely with the Marketing, Business Analyst, Strategy, and Demand team, as well as the greater GoFood Product team, you’ll help to drive an effective and strategic decision-making process by providing a holistic view of the market and competitive insights. Collectively, by devising and navigating strategic and data-driven initiatives for the team, your efforts will further position GoFood as the most preferred food delivery platform in Indonesia and beyond.

item.title: Information Security Manager
item.description:
About the Role
The Information Security Manager will play a crucial role in the implementation of the Information Security programs. You will work closely with the Information Security Chief of Staff and collaborate with leadership and technical teams on the continued evolution of Information Security programs across the cybersecurity, and company functions. We are looking for someone who has good knowledge of information security domains, a passion to execute the long-term strategy, and a strong aim to empower others. Self-starter mentality, analytical thinking, good communication, collaboration skills, and attention to detail are key.

item.title: In-App Copywriter
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding in-app campaigns that lead to user engagement and conversion, look no further. As an In-app Copywriter, you’ll execute a successful in-app marketing campaign by combining user behavior and creative content. The role is about executing and analyzing in-app marketing creatives. As an In-app Copywriter, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the Marketing wheel of Gojek. Based in Jakarta, Indonesia, you’ll execute our in-app creative copywriting that directly influence user engagement and conversion rates. You’ll get a front-row seat (and get your hands dirty) in executing in-app marketing creatives, marrying insights from user behaviors and trends with creative, relatable content. You’ll prioritize marketing creatives based on team objectives, and follow the team’s KPI that has been set.

item.title: Head of Risk Experience
item.description:
About the Role
Our company depends on the Risk function to provide solutions for several challenges impacting the Trust & Safety of our platform. These can range from verifying the identity of users to identifying errant behavior patterns, preventing fraudsters from misusing our platform, and keeping our users safe whilst using our services. You will define, design, and develop products and services that are comprehensive and easily accessible to other businesses and platforms. You will also coordinate their integration in various platforms and services, ensuring that the fraud and resilience concerns are mitigated and that the required defenses are in place across all products.
You will optimize our communication and processes to make them clear, efficient, fast, and effective to serve our users better and improve customer satisfaction. You will also be the champion of user-centricity in all of our Risk treatments.

item.title: Head of Risk Analytics - Tokopedia
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, data-driven team and an opportunity to hone your business intelligence and data visualization, and storytelling skills, look no further. As Tokopedia Risk Analytics Manager you will be working with a team of risk professionals to define, measure, quantify and track risks in the Tokopedia ecosystem. Working closely with Risk teams in GoTo Group, you will help to identify and categorize risk types, define metrics to measure and create visualization and dashboards to monitor them. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to make Trust and Safety a top priority at Tokopedia.

item.title: Head of Partnership (Jago)
item.description: About the Role - To become a source of competitive advantage in creating a sustainable, strong, and long-term alliance with partners across Indonesia financial institutions.

item.title: Growth Ops Analyst - GoFin
item.description:
About the role:
As a Growth Ops Analyst on the Financial Services Platform, you will be working closely with the Marketing team, utilizing our voluminous data to improve the performance of both tactical and strategic campaigns. You will have ample opportunity to flex your analytics and project management skills, getting us even closer to the financial inclusion of all Indonesian. You will be based in the Jakarta office.

item.title: Growth Manager, Merchant Payments
item.description:
About the role
Here comes a new challenge for you who is seeking the next leap in your career growth, being our Growth Manager for Merchant Payments (part of the GoPay group)! In this role, you will lead problem-solving processes and execute solutions with a focus on improving operations for merchant funded promotions. Combining business strategy, data prowess and merchant (and sales) experience, you will work on initiatives that will empower teams to run campaigns more seamlessly and efficiently. In short, you’ll get out of bed every day thinking about new ways to solve exciting problems and grow the merchant business. How cool is that?

item.title: Growth Manager, GoFood
item.description:
About the Role
Here comes a new challenge for you who are seeking the next leap in your career growth, being our Growth Manager for GoFood! In this role, you will lead problem-solving processes and execute solutions with a focus on improving demand and growth metrics for GoFood. Combining business strategy and customer experience & behavior analysis, you will do experiments and campaigns that will encourage our users to experience the product’s core value as quickly as possible which will also improve the product's account spending. In short, you’ll get out of bed every day thinking about new ways to solve exciting problems and grow the business, how cool is that!

item.title: Group Internal Control & Compliance - Advisory Manager
item.description:
About the Role
In this key strategic role, you will be part of the Vietnam GojekInternal Control (IC) and Compliance Team. Focusing heavily on performing corporate compliance programs, ensuring the establishment and the implementation of relevant group IC & Compliance policies and Gojek procedures, building the compliance culture through practical compliance training & communication programs execution, and assisting the adoption of group IC & Compliance standards (guideline) towards Gojek Vietnam.
You will employ your subject matter expertise and organizational agility to assist the operationalization of corporate compliance programs for the Gojek ecosystem, particularly for Vietnam. Essentially, you will be part of the team who protects the company, manage risk related to the Gojek ecosystem by ensuring rigorous processes and controls are in place to meet regulatory and shareholders' expectations, align the business activities with the company code of conduct, group policies and international standards of good practices.

item.title: Group Compensation Systems & Analytics Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
GoTo is looking for a Group Compensation Systems & Analytics Specialist to be a key strategic partner for our Group and People Business Partners. The role will focus on enabling Business outcomes by influencing decisions aligned with GoTo’s Compensation Philosophy.

item.title: Group Compensation Systems & Analytics Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
GoTo is looking for a Group Compensation Systems & Analytics Specialist to be a key strategic partner for our Group and People Business Partners. The role will focus on enabling Business outcomes by influencing decisions aligned with GoTo’s Compensation Philosophy.

item.title: GoPay Content Writer - Intern
item.description: About the role: This role reports directly to the Head of Social Media & Digital Content and works closely with the Brand team & other pods to grow various social media channels and manage content production for GoPay marketing activities, leading a team of social media specialists.

item.title: GoPay Content Writer
item.description: About the role: This role reports directly to the Head of Social Media & Digital Content and works closely with the Brand team & other pods to grow various social media channels and manage content production for GoPay marketing activities, leading a team of social media specialists.

item.title: Go-To-Market Manager - 7697
item.description:
About the Role
We’re looking for talented individuals to join us on our mission to become an indispensable business partner for merchants and to help set the strategic vision, determine that the vision is commercially viable, and then incubate, launch and drive adoption of successful manifestations of the visions in partnership with the broader organization.
The Go-To Market (GTM) team acts as the business team for the Merchant Platform Core Product. You need to lead the GTM working groups and collaborate closely with the product, sales, marketing, ops team for product rollout and adoption of platform features and/or various use cases hosted by GoBiz surfaces.

item.title: Full-Stack Engineer - Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Full Stack Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the Risk Team based in Indonesia. Your main objective will be to build services for the Merchant Risk platform. You'll work extensively with Data Scientists, Data Analysts, and Product Managers to detect and prevent fraudulent and/or abusive behaviors to ensure a trusted and fair core platform for our merchant-partners. You'll have ample opportunity to flex your collaboration and leadership skills, getting us even closer to our ultimate goal of creating a seamless app that will transport GoTo Financials to all corners of the globe

item.title: Full Stack Engineer Lead - Merchant Payment - 7867
item.description:
About the role
Merchant Payment is looking for passionate, entrepreneurial technical leaders with a drive of building scalable applications and teams. In this role you will be responsible for the overall delivery of your team and will interface very closely with business stakeholders and product stakeholders to deliver a cutting edge product aimed at improving customer experience on Payment. A strong sense of prioritization, deep technical expertise along with taking care of growth and development of the team, are essential in this role

item.title: Full Stack Engineer - KYC
item.description:
About the role
You will be part of the risk mitigation team. In this role, you'll focus on building and scaling the sanctions platform. Sanctions platform is a single place where Analysts can write rules and take actions on fraudulent users/ transactions and operations can handle appeals and manage sanctions. This will be a generic/domain agnostic platform that can be used across organizations in GOTO Financial. You will also focus on building an effective sanctions and appeal workflow for customer care agents. You will be responsible for designing, developing, deploying frontend applications with a high sense of ownership. Additionally, you'll devise and manage our entire web infrastructure, and produce innovative solutions that our users will enjoy.

item.title: FP&A Manager/Senior Manager
item.description:
About The Role
We are currently seeking a Senior Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) Manager at the GoTo Group HoldCo level, supporting the coverage of the GoTo Financial vertical (includes GoPay, GoFinance, etc.). In this role, you will be involved in a broad range of finance activities including budgeting, business & financial review, and financial modeling. You will be at the front seat to GoTo’s strategy formulation and some of the most important corporate decisions of the Senior Management (CEO, CFO, etc.) from a financial planning and analysis standpoint, particularly as we move towards an IPO.

item.title: Financial Consolidation System Support
item.description:
About the Role
As our Financial Consolidation System Support, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the Finance IT Business Partner (ITBP) wheel of Gojek that directly supports the Finance Accounting and Tax (FAT) team in performing their daily activities, to achieve accurate and timely financial closing especially in financial consolidation area. You’ll also collaborate with technical support, data analysts, and other stakeholders in handling day-to-day inquiries, providing consultation support, and helping to resolve their respective issues. The support your team provides the FAT platform will guide their decision-making process and steer the trajectory of the company’s business and financial endeavors.

item.title: Enterprise Sales Support Associate
item.description:
About the Role
They say no man is an island, and this notion holds particularly true for this role. As our Enterprise Sales Support Associate, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the Sales team wheel of Gojek that directly impacts the company’s SOP to solve day-to-day problems faced by Enterprise merchants and the HQ Enterprise Sales Team members. Your main objectives will be to uphold and improve business processes for the sales support team, work with the HQ Enterprise Sales Team to help advocate for our merchants’ needs internally, and ensure seamless implementation of Gojek solutions with and/or within the merchant’s ecosystem with the respective merchant’s IT team. The Enterprise Sales team will be your companions during this ride. You will have the opportunity to flex and hone in on your business strategy, multi-tasking, analytical, and time-management skills, catering to the day-to-day needs and issues of our beloved merchants.

item.title: Enterprise Risk Management Lead
item.description:
About the Role
As our Enterprise Risk and Governance Lead, you'll take the wheel in establishing various risk management frameworks and programs, as well as designing and executing risk related campaigns in efforts to cultivate a risk management culture centered around trust and confidence amongst our stakeholders.
As part of the Risk Governance team at our holding company GoTo, you’ll also establish a rigorous risk governance and risk reporting program to the Risk Management Committee and Audit Committee. Your efforts will directly bolster the continuous improvement of our ecosystem integrity aimed at further amplifying users’ trust perception of GoTo Group. This role is exciting as you will be interfacing with dynamic, ambitious, and result-driven individuals that are focused on improvements. Join us in a race to provide a safe and trusted platform that our customers count on and love to come back to.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Product
item.description:
About the Role - We are looking for an experienced data engineer who has expertise and in-depth knowledge of building the products with the Do It Yourself(DIY) Vision. As a member of the Data Engineering team, you will be at the epicenter of an amazing company, experiencing extreme growth and solving the problems that come with scaling rapidly.
You will work closely with the business teams and other data teams to improve the accessibility & reliability of data while leveraging the largest-scale data processing technologies in the world. In order to succeed in this role, you should have a product mindset along with a strong vision of building data products for a massively scalable data engineering platform.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Payments - KYC
item.description:
About the role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team that enjoys building creative solutions for users, look no further.
As an engineering manager in the Payments Platform team, you will be responsible for developing innovative platform solutions, building & grow a high-performance team, and responsible for the overall delivery of your team. You should be adept and passionate about solving problems blending technology with customer obsession. You will collaborate closely with business and product stakeholders to deliver high-quality products. With strong prioritization skills and deep technical expertise, you’ll get to pilot this team to greater heights.
The cherry on top: This would be your chance to spearhead the change and redefine the KYC ecosystem in Indonesia and the rest of southeast Asia.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Payments
item.description:
About the Role
You will play an essential role in developing products and executing business strategies. You will be working very closely with business development manager, product manager, technical architect, and engineers to evaluate 3rd party vendors, available technology choices, conversion of product roadmap into an engineering execution plan, sprint management and work with engineers and the quality assurance team for timely quality deliverables. You will also be responsible for engineering team management and growth. Throughout this exciting experience, you’ll build relationships with internal and external stakeholders, from the product, marketing, research, and operation team among others to meet the fast-paced nature of the financial technology industry.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Payments
item.description:
About the Role
You will play an essential role in developing products and executing business strategies. You will be working very closely with business development manager, product manager, technical architect, and engineers to evaluate 3rd party vendors, available technology choices, conversion of product roadmap into an engineering execution plan, sprint management and work with engineers and the quality assurance team for timely quality deliverables. You will also be responsible for engineering team management and growth. Throughout this exciting experience, you’ll build relationships with internal and external stakeholders, from the product, marketing, research, and operation team among others to meet the fast-paced nature of the financial technology industry.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our engineering manager. GoBiz Merchant Platform team in Indonesia and India provides solutions for merchants across Indonesia and other southeast Asian countries. The GoBiz merchant platform supports a massive network of small, medium, and large businesses.
The platform delivers a world-class merchant experience through multimodal surfaces on the mobile, web, and open APIs. The teams achieve this through the latest frontend architectures that enable internal product teams like GoFood and GoPay, to deliver rich experiences through the GoBiz surfaces.
The platform provides efficient and effective capabilities for cross-cutting concerns across multiple GoJek teams. Internal teams can hence focus on delivering profound experiences without reinventing capabilities. The platform teams invest in large-scale distributed event-driven systems with cloud-native frameworks to provide high-performance, stable, and operationally efficient systems.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our engineering manager. GoBiz Merchant Platform team in Indonesia and India provides solutions for merchants across Indonesia and other southeast Asian countries. The GoBiz merchant platform supports a massive network of small, medium, and large businesses.
The platform delivers a world-class merchant experience through multimodal surfaces on the mobile, web, and open APIs. The teams achieve this through the latest frontend architectures that enable internal product teams like GoFood and GoPay, to deliver rich experiences through the GoBiz surfaces.
The platform provides efficient and effective capabilities for cross-cutting concerns across multiple GoJek teams. Internal teams can hence focus on delivering profound experiences without reinventing capabilities. The platform teams invest in large-scale distributed event-driven systems with cloud-native frameworks to provide high-performance, stable, and operationally efficient systems.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Marketplace
item.description:
About the Role
Roll up your sleeves and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Engineering Manager. In this role, you would be tasked with platformization of the Mobility Marketplace as a first-class problem, which requires understanding end-to-end use-cases and challenge the status quo at all times by reviewing current engineering techniques and tools and scout for opportunities and fundamental engineering solutions that would bring agility & reliability to enable more business opportunities.
To excel in this role we believe you need the ability to drive strategic technical, delivery and people decisions for the team by collaborating with cross-functional counterparts and stakeholders and also considering inputs from various parties, most importantly from the customers. You are also expected to coach and nurture your team.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Infrastructure Engineering
item.description:
About the Role :
We are looking for an experienced data engineer who has expertise and in depth knowledge of managing the data infrastructure in a cloud environment. In this role, you will be required to lead a small team of two Data Engineers and create a reliable infrastructure for Gojek Payments and Financial Services. In order to succeed in this role, you should have a product mindset along with a strong vision of automating and creating a scalable data infrastructure.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Groceries
item.description:
About the Role
As our Engineering Manager for Gojek Groceries, you'll play an integral part in designing solutions for GoMart - Gojek's online groceries platform. You’ll spend your time writing elegant, bulletproof code, enhancing our engineering strategy, mentoring a talented troop of engineers, driving critical projects, and designing microservices to further evolve GoMart's system. With this team, you'll be presented with ample opportunities to tackle challenging problems and build systems from scratch. Your efforts will directly improve the productivity of our engineers and revolutionize grocery shopping in Indonesia and beyond.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Gopay
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly analytical team that enjoys building creative solutions for users, look no further. As our Engineering Manager for the Payments group, you'll take the wheel in building a high-performing team of engineers, developing innovative payment solutions, and driving the overall delivery of your team. You'll get your hands dirty in solving complex issues that blend smart technology with a customer-centric focus, and lay out the roadmap for your team to follow. In collaboration with Business and Product stakeholders, you'll shape business OKRs and plans, and oversee any stakeholder communications related to deliverables and risks within your project. The cherry on top: your efforts will contribute in redefining the payments ecosystem in Indonesia, bringing wider and more inclusive financial services to the region and beyond.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Gofood
item.description:
About the Role
At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Engineering Manager for the GoFood Consumer Booking team, you’ll take the wheel in leading a team of 10 to 15 engineers, overseeing the system design within the scope of your team. You will be responsible for defining the charter for the team by collaborating with product, design & business stakeholders. You’ll have full accountability for the growth and development of your team, adjusting their work pace and consistently engaging in knowledge-sharing endeavours. As the first formal leadership role in the Gojek engineering organisation, you’ll help ensure the inner workings of your team are operating seamlessly, providing the most effective and reliable way of ordering by delivering a cutting-edge product aimed at improving customer experience on GoFood.
The consumer booking team is responsible for the overall ordering experience of the consumer at GoFood. The team focuses on building highly secure, high throughput & resilient systems for the ordering flow to ensure the top-notch customer experience.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Data Engineering
item.description: At Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do: bringing our ideas to life and into the lives of our users. As our Engineering Manager for the Data Engineering team, you’ll take the wheel in overseeing Back-end Engineering at Gojek - designing and developing highly scalable, reliable, maintainable and fault tolerant systems for our Data Engineering team. Along with owning the entire life cycle of these projects, you will establish and evangelize the best engineering practices for your team to follow. Working closely with the data catalog team, data engineers and data scientists, you will get to contribute to the system that runs meaningful experiments for GoJEK. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to provide APIs for GoJEK’s millions of users and driver partners to use.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Cartography
item.description: Roll up your sleeves and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Engineering Manager at Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do to bring cheer to the lives of millions. As an Engineering Manager, you will be part of the team, building some of the most critical products for Gojek's ecosystem of consumers, drivers, and merchants. You will be accountable for leading a team of 10 - 15 engineers. Your ownership, drive, and passion would help provide a world-class user experience and stability for our Cartography products. To excel in this role, we believe you need to have excellent ability in prioritizing and tactical decision making along with deep technical expertise and eagerness to take a hands-on approach as necessary in delivering values for the customers.

item.title: Engineering Manager - Cartography
item.description: Roll up your sleeves and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Engineering Manager at Gojek, engineering is central to everything we do to bring cheer to the lives of millions. As an Engineering Manager, you will be part of the team, building some of the most critical products for Gojek's ecosystem of consumers, drivers, and merchants. You will be accountable for leading a team of 5 - 10 engineers. Your ownership, drive, and passion would help provide a world-class user experience and stability for our Cartography products. To excel in this role, we believe you need to have excellent ability in prioritizing and tactical decision making along with deep technical expertise and eagerness to take a hands-on approach as necessary in delivering values for the customers.

item.title: Employee Relations Manager
item.description: Buckle up if you’re ready to be our Employee Relations Manager. In this role, you will be an integral player within the HR Compliance team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Focusing heavily on Employee Relations main processes, you will help to ensure that the company adheres to legal standards and policies, stay up to date on all general labor law compliance and issues, thoroughly understanding compliance laws, providing adequate communication to managers and employees about such laws, as well as being responsible for providing guidance on Employee Relation matters. The folks in the GTF People Operations team(s) will be your companions on this ride. Your efforts will band together to enhance the company's operational excellence.

item.title: District Engagement Acquisition Associate (Central Java)
item.description:
About the Role:
District Engagement & Acquisition Associate role is to acquire new promising merchants to Gojek's universe and provide the best set of merchants to customers. The role reports to the Direct Sales Manager

item.title: Digital Sourcing Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
As our Sourcing Specialist in the Digital Marketing Sourcing Category, you’ll be an integral player within the Procurement team based in Jakarta. We oversee all Procurement things related to Digital Marketing and Sourcing categories. Specifically, we do sourcing activities that relate to goods/ services in several categories with nature of procuring Digital Marketing related i.e Above the line and Below the line, knowing about the details of marketing area Online, offline, Digital Platform and working with cross-business units who require such products/ services.
You’ll be assisting in leading Procurement buyers within the Digital Marketing Sourcing team and also as a single contributor in handling the assigned sourcing activities. If you’re looking for a chance to hone your skills vertically and horizontally, Procurement is the right place to learn it. You’ll employ your skills and experiences to add more power to enrich the team’s strategy and project fulfillment.

item.title: Digital Media Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
Based in Jakarta, as the Digital Media Specialist you will be managing paid digital media campaign execution, optimization and reporting across display, video, search and others. These campaigns aim to strengthen awareness, drive new and repeat users, and ultimately business results for Gojek. You will be part of a young, dynamic and results-driven team, and will directly contribute to shaping the future of the team and the business.

item.title: Digital Marketing Procurement Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
As our Procurement Specialist in the Digital Marketing Sourcing Category, you’ll be an integral player within the Procurement team based in Jakarta. We oversee all Procurement things related to Digital Marketing and Sourcing categories. Specifically, we do sourcing activities that relate to goods/ services in several categories with nature of procuring Digital Marketing related i.e Above the line and Below the line, knowing about the details of marketing area Online, offline, Digital Platform and working with cross-business units who require such products/ services.
You’ll be assisting in leading Procurement buyers within the Digital Marketing Sourcing team and also as a single contributor in handling the assigned sourcing activities. If you’re looking for a chance to hone your skills vertically and horizontally, Procurement is the right place to learn it. You’ll employ your skills and experiences to add more power to enrich the team’s strategy and project fulfillment.

item.title: DevOps Engineer - Merchant Payments
item.description:
About the role
As a Devops Engineer you will be a part of the Merchant Payments Devops Team. Working with energetic and talented troop of engineers, Your primary focus will be on building, operating, and maintaining the Merchant Payments systems on cloud/on-premises, Constantly diagnosing the health of the system, responding to incidents, and providing support to all payment ecosystems. You will work very closely with developer and product stakeholders to deliver and support high-quality products and systems. An intermediate understanding of code/programming and automation is therefore necessary as well.

item.title: DesignOps Manager
item.description:
About the Role
DesignOps is the central nervous system of the Design Team at Gojek. We strive to optimize the effectiveness and quality of the design at Gojek by evolving and accelerating our people, culture, practices, and tools. We strive to enable people to be their best possible selves. We are looking for someone to join our DesignOps team who has the first-hand experience in building and managing digital products with a strong background in project management and is excited by the idea of working with a large team of designers to help them realize their potential.
As a Design Program Manager, you will design how designers design. Dream, explore, create, and nurture other designers’ skills and processes, identifying areas for improvement through collaborating across functions at Gojek.

item.title: Data Warehouse Engineer - Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
They say no man is an island, and this notion holds particularly true for this role. As our Data Warehouse Developer, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the Data Warehouse wheel of Gojek that directly impacts the company’s single source of truth of data. Your main objective will be to build out our data warehouse. Product Managers, BI Analytics and Product Engineers will be your companions during this ride. Best yet, you’ll have the opportunity to flex your SQL, data modeling and data warehouse concept skills, helping the team craft beautifully simple solutions for challenging user stories.

item.title: Data Warehouse Engineer - GoPay
item.description:
About the Role
As our Data Warehouse Developer, you’ll be an instrumental player in Gojek’s Data team that drives the company’s analytical data infrastructure. You’ll take the wheel in designing, developing, and managing our data warehouse and data infrastructure that supports it, ensuring these systems operate reliably at scale through a high degree of automation. You’ll also oversee the single source of truth of data for analytics, partnering with product managers, product engineers, data engineers, BI/analytics, and data scientists during this ride. You’ll play an active role in ensuring data governance policies and tooling are implemented and adhered to, and assist the team in utilizing data to deliver beautifully simple and scalable solutions to meet user needs.

item.title: Data Warehouse Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
As our Data Warehouse Developer, you’ll be an instrumental cog in the data warehouse that directly impacts the company’s single source of truth of data. You will be handling the data pipelines and warehouse for the products under the Commerce Enablement business of GTF. Product Managers, BI Analytics, and Product Engineers will be your companions during this ride. Best yet, you’ll have the opportunity to flex your SQL, data modeling and data warehouse concept skills, helping the team craft beautifully simple solutions for challenging user stories.

item.title: Data Scientist - Risk Platform
item.description:
About the Role
Gojek is committed to creating a safe and trusted platform for all - drivers, consumers and merchants. Fraud has a large impact on both the user experience and financials - you will thus be working in an area of high relevance and impact. Specifically, you will help develop data-driven methodologies to reduce fraud risk and improve user experience on the platform. This will entail identifying relevant data sources, evaluating them and building predictive models for fraud detection. You will have the opportunity to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment in a cross-functional team with business and product stakeholders and leverage our vast data and the Big Data infrastructure.

item.title: Data Scientist - Risk - Gopay - 7897
item.description:
About the Role
As a data scientist in our Risk Data team, you will create data science models which protect GoPay and its customers. You will have the opportunity to work with rich data to derive new intelligence and use various data science techniques. You will partner with Risk, product and engineering stakeholders to identify and solve some of the most impactful and stimulating business problems in the payments space. You will work in a fast-paced environment with direct impacts to the business.

item.title: Data Scientist - GoMart
item.description:
About the Role
They say no man is an island, and this holds true here at Gojek. As our Decision Scientist, you’ll be part of the data team that directly impacts GoMart's business, which is one of the top contributors to Gojek's business.. Your main objective will be to create business impact at scale. The Business and Product Team will be your companions during this ride. Best yet, you’ll have the opportunity to flex both your analytics and DS skills!. What differentiates Gojek from other companies is the pace at which you can see your analysis and insights come to life and impact millions of customers and thousands of merchants partners

item.title: Data Science - Internship (Loyalty, Partnership & Monetisation team)
item.description:
About the Role
In this role, you'll be working with teams that generate impact by solving business/product problems using data science (DS) techniques/models. To add to the excitement, you’ll be exposed to working in diverse, cross-functional teams that may include Software Engineers, Analytics Team and Product Managers. In our humble opinion, the coolest part of this role is how your work will directly impact how the senior leaders at Gojek shape strategies around millions of customers across Southeast Asia.

item.title: Data Privacy Engineer-GoTo Financial
item.description:
About The Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding Data Privacy, look no further. As our Data Privacy Engineer for Data Security Privacy team, you’ll take the wheel inbuild privacy design structures for GoTo Financial. Along with Implement Data Discovery solutions, you will be in charge of Develop and maintain critical documentation and Coordinate with 3rd party security vendors. Working closely with various teams across GTF, you will get to implement data protection controls. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to ensure GoTo Financial data protected.

item.title: Data Privacy Engineer-GoTo Financial
item.description:
About The Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding Data Privacy, look no further. As our Data Privacy Engineer for Data Security Privacy team, you’ll take the wheel inbuild privacy design structures for GoTo Financial. Along with Implement Data Discovery solutions, you will be in charge of Develop and maintain critical documentation and Coordinate with 3rd party security vendors. Working closely with various teams across GTF, you will get to implement data protection controls. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to ensure GoTo Financial data protected.

item.title: Data Privacy Analyst-GoTo Financial
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding data privacy, look no further. As Data Privacy Analyst, you’ll take the wheel in building privacy culture for GoTo Financial. Along with privacy compliance, you will help us drive adoption of privacy technologies and be in charge of overall data protection. Working closely with the Product, Engineering and Legal team, you will get to manage projects pertaining to Data Privacy Initiatives. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to protect customer, employee and partner’s data.

item.title: Data Privacy Analyst-GoTo Financial
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding data privacy, look no further. As Data Privacy Analyst, you’ll take the wheel in building privacy culture for GoTo Financial. Along with privacy compliance, you will help us drive adoption of privacy technologies and be in charge of overall data protection. Working closely with the Product, Engineering and Legal team, you will get to manage projects pertaining to Data Privacy Initiatives. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to protect customer, employee and partner’s data.

item.title: Data Engineering Manager, Data Platform
item.description:
About the Role
As GoPay is undergoing exponential growth, our data has followed the same growth curve. Thus, as an integral member of the Data Engineering team, you'll be at the epicenter of one of Southeast Asia's most coveted companies, and get to witness and solve the challenges that come with rapid scaling.
As our Data Engineering Lead for our Payments team, you'll focus heavily on building and scaling a data platform that enables and delivers reliable, trustworthy, and approachable data to our users. You'll also get to design, develop, and deploy applications with a high sense of ownership. Additionally, you’ll lead a lean team of Data Engineers and build robust data engineering products and infrastructures that'll propel the business to achieve their objectives through a data-driven approach. The core data platforms you’ll build will deliver, model, and curate data for the entire Gojek Payments platform.

item.title: Data Engineer - Data Platform
item.description:
About the role:
We are a data driven company - we take pride in being hypothesis driven; our experimentation platform Litmus, has made it possible to run targeted experiments on-demand to guide our super app, driver app product experience and business decisions. We are now in the process of evolving it to the next level through automation at scale and building decision ready analytics systems. In this role as our Data Engineer for the Experimentation Team, you will be handed the reins to build A/B tests analytical metric intelligent experimentation platform for Gojek. You will be in charge of writing ELT/ETL pipeline code in Batch and store them in an OLAP store for exploratory analytics. Some work involves in pre-aggregate billions of clickstream events, provide real time querying capabilities scanning billions of rows from a OLAP store. Working closely with backend engineers and data scientists, you will get to contribute to the system that runs meaningful experiments for Gojek.

item.title: Data Analyst - Consumer Platform
item.description:
About The Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you're ready to be our Data Analyst. In this role, you'll be a pivotal member within the Customer Platform group, mining insights from the sea of data, building analytics products, generating insights and designing experiments with the ability to see the real-time impact of your contribution. A talented troop of business leads and fellow data scientists will be your companions on this ride. In our humble opinion, the coolest part of this role is how your work will directly impact how the senior leaders at Gojek shape strategies around millions of customers across Southeast Asia.

item.title: Credit Risk Policy Analyst - Merchant Lending, Financial Services Platform
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb aboard if you’re ready to be our Credit Risk Policy Analyst. In this role, you will collaborate with Product Managers, Data Science, Growth, and Risk Analytics teams. Your main responsibility will be to strategically develop and manage credit risk policy to enable the business to grow by acquiring new users and manage the merchant's lending portfolio within risk appetite. With your expertise, you’ll be instrumental in helping to drive our team closer to our ultimate goal of providing financial service access to all Indonesians, ensuring everything they do works in harmony with Gojek’s goals and values.

item.title: Creative Lead GoPay #7112
item.description: About the role: This role reports directly to the Head of Social Media & Digital Content and works closely with the Brand team & other pods to manage the creative development and production for GoPay marketing activities, leading a team of graphic designers.

item.title: Creative Designer - GoPay
item.description:
About the Role
GoPay Design Team is looking for a creative designer rooted in visual design and experienced in branding and UI/UX. You will be responsible for designing and maintaining GoPay brands and its products, supporting product team needs, collaborating with other creatives such as illustrators, writers, photographers and not limited to other teams from different streams.

item.title: Corporate Development Manager
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding funding and capital market strategy, valuation analysis, and trends in the industry, look no further. As our Corporate Development Manager for the Corporate Office, you’ll have a front seat to GoTo’s strategy formulation and some of the most important decisions of the organization from a corporate development standpoint, and will be exposed to a myriad of situations, not just in financial analysis, but also in deal structuring, M&A, forming strategic partnerships, investor relations and more. The cherry on top: you’ll get to create leverage for our product teams to capture opportunities and establish our competitive edge, all whilst protecting the interests of GoTo and our stakeholders.

item.title: Corporate Development Analyst/Associate (M&A, Investments, Valuation, Financial Modeling)
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team and an opportunity to dive deep into projects surrounding funding and capital market strategy, valuation analysis, and trends in the industry, look no further. As our Corporate Development and Investor Relations Associate for the Corporate Office, you’ll have a front seat to GoTo’s strategy formulation and some of the most important decisions of the organization from a corporate development standpoint, and will be exposed to a myriad of situations, not just in financial analysis, but also in deal structuring, M&A, forming strategic partnerships, investor relations and more. The cherry on top: you’ll get to create leverage for our product teams to capture opportunities and establish our competitive edge, all whilst protecting the interests of GoTo and our stakeholders.

item.title: Content Creator Specialist
item.description:
About the Role
As Content Creator Specialist for Creative Lab, you’ll take the wheel in communicating ideas that inspire, inform, and captivate consumers. You will be in charge of producing the overall layout and design for any social media creative assets. Working closely with Content Planner and Art Director, you will get the chance to explore your imagination and create the best visual concepts for the Gojek’s social media projects.

item.title: Consumer Risk Project & Policy Manager - Financial Services Platform
item.description:
About the Role
Come and join new breeds of risk managers!
On Gojek's Financial Services Platform, Risk Managers are tasked to enable aggressive growth while maintaining long-term business sustainability. As Financial Technology has fast become an essential solution in daily life, new market segments are opening up for financial inclusion, new Fintech products are being launched, thus increasing more adoptions. Here at Gojek's Financial Services Platform, we strive to become a major player in the market, and we are looking for talents with a can-do attitude who have what it takes to make it happen!
The role of Consumer Risk Project and Policy Manager requires a proactive, creative, logical, and well-structured individual to drive and deliver projects to completion, navigating through regulations, covering all aspects of risks, with sound judgment and mature decision-making process, with the ultimate goal of improving overall user experience. You will be working together with various functions within Gojek's Financial Services Platform and across to sister companies, also various functions with expected regular interactions with senior managers.

item.title: Consumer Risk Analyst - Trust/ Anti-Scam - 4982
item.description:
About the Role
We are looking for exceptional risk analyst to identify potential fraud risk, develop mitigating strategies in our expanding business. The role holder will be responsible for delivering on target risk metrics - by analyzing data and implementing risk rules and recommending mitigation plans.

item.title: Consumer Lending - Software Engineer - SE2
item.description:
About the Role
If you're looking to hone in on your engineering abilities and work on mission-critical high scalability distributed systems, this may be the job for you. As a Senior Software Engineer, your contributions will be crucial for development of financial products. You will help shape the future of our Consumer Lending products, and more importantly, help millions of users meet their financial needs responsibly.

item.title: Consumer Fraud Risk Policy Manager - Financial Services Platform
item.description:
About the Role
On Gojek's Financial Services Platform, Risk Managers are tasked to enable aggressive growth while maintaining long-term business sustainability. As Financial Technology has fast become an essential solution in daily life, new market segments are opening up for financial inclusion, new Fintech products are being launched, thus increasing more adoptions. Here at Financial Services Platform, we strive to become a major player in the market, and we are looking for talents with a can-do attitude who have what it takes to make it happen!
The role of Consumer Fraud Risk Policy Manager requires a proactive and critical-thinking individual, with the hunger to learn and consistently have a sense of urgency for implementation. You will be working together with various functions within Financial Services Platform and across to various functions, such as risk, operations, data science, partnership, product, data engineering, legal, and compliance, where you will be expected to be the subject matter expert in fraud management for lending.

item.title: Consumer Engagement Associate Pay (Tangerang & Depok) - GoPay - #7163
item.description:
About the Role
GoPay Consumer Engagement Associate will be responsible for any GoPay MTU acquisition and activation by creating and implementing strategic marketing plans across various touchpoints namely visibility, partnership, and digital to name a few. You will also be responsible for the marketing funnel of GoPay at the appointed district aligned with the headquarter initiatives. You will work closely with the GoPay Marketing, Regional Consumer Engagement Head, and GoPay sales team.

You will be working together with various functions within Gojek's Financial Services Platform and across to sister companies and various functions, such as risk, operations, data science, partnership, product, data engineering, legal, and compliance, where you will be expected to be the subject matter expert in credit risk management.

item.title: Compensation Solutions Partner
item.description:
About the Role
Join the team that stays relevant and innovative in driving competitive compensation for the GoTo Group. As our Compensation Solutions Partner, you will be a member of the Global Compensation Business Partnering Team, A where the main mission is to independently facilitate key compensation outcomes for their designated client groups with centrally developed products and core processes. Working alongside bright minds in GoTo, you’ll be part of the team that bring happiness to your partner!

item.title: Compensation Solutions Partner
item.description:

item.title: Collection Strategy and Policy Manager
item.description:
About the Role The role is responsible for developing, maintaining, and improving Collection policies, strategies, MIS reports, processes and procedures, conducting complex analysis and providing accurate and concise results with recommendations to management.You will need to leverage data and score models to define and propose strategy/solutions that deliver measurable improvements in collections and recoveries performance.You will be using advanced analytical tools and techniques to and will be responsible for owning processes and will be accountable for driving continuous improvements in the end to end Collection activities.You will work closely with internal business partners in scoring and analytics and Collections Operations to re-define the Collections approach delivering a more analytical, measurable and cost-effective strategy.
What You Will Do - Create segmentation in the portfolio based on the risk for efficient handling - Monitoring portfolio for increasing delinquency patterns based on the portfolio triggers - Creating meaningful management reporting and analysis for portfolio review - Analyze data to identify early warning signals (Productivity, efficiency & effectiveness) and proactively provide feedback in order to take corrective actions - Effective trigger based on monitoring to ensure adherence to the process in place and regular improvement ideas for initiating positive changes in the process. - Proactively seeks, finds and recommends opportunities to improve customer experience, processes, policies, budget vs actual and profit for the company - Provides accurate and concise results and presents findings, recommendations and presentations to Senior Management - Proactively finds work/ analysis that helps collection/ recovery team to improve performance - Expected to work on multiple projects with limited guidance - Effectively mentors other team mates to help them develop their analytics tools & techniques and risk management skills and knowledge about the business and processes - Create regular champion challengers to drive continuous improvement(improved performance, reducing cost)
What You Will Need - Min 5years experience in the consumer lending industry with direct experience in managing Collection strategy/analytics will be a huge plus point. - Bachelor's/ Master degree in a quantitative discipline; Math, Finance, Statistics, Economics or equivalent work/training is required; advanced degree is preferred - Strong analytical, technical and statistical skills. Ability to synthesize / analyze diverse information, develop recommendations, and makes decisions - Ability to analyze, understand root cause - Strong communication and interpersonal skills, ability to interact with individuals across departments / functions and with senior-level individuals, should have the ability to present information confidently in a crisp and easily understandable way - Proven record in problem solving and business innovation. Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment - Project Management Skills - well-organized, structured approach. Ability to achieve tight timelines on complex deliverables. Ability to manage and prioritize projects across cross-functional groups - Hands on knowledge on tools like SAS, SQL, R and other analytics tools About the Team GOFinance Consumer Risk team manages the Credit, Fraud and Operational Risk side of the lending business. The Head of Portfolio Risk Management will supervise a team of 3 Risk analysts. Our Objective as part of GoTo’s Risk Team, especially as the Financial Services Platform Risk Team, is to ensure a safe and trusted platform that our users can trust, rely on, and love to come back to. Based in Jakarta, Indonesia, our team manages the Credit and Fraud Risk side of the consumer lending business. Our team consists of multi-background individuals. We work together to anticipate and predict potential credit risk and fraud threats by building tools to minimize the credit and fraud loss whilst maximizing net revenue. We partner closely with several cross-functional teams to ensure safe and sustainable business growth and reliable financial services for our users, our GoTo businesses, and our extended ecosystem. Our team is constantly working on projects that continuously bolster our risk management framework, maintain the highest standard of best practices, and improve the resilience of our GTF services products. This is a particularly exciting time to join our family as we’re focused on scaling this team to support GoTo’s growing markets, businesses, and future product launches, propelling our services to all corners of the globe. The questions that are always in the back of our minds are: How do we push the envelope in fortifying our risk mitigation efforts, making them stronger than their last iterations, and how can we effectively increase risk awareness throughout all factions of our company? When we aren’t busy fighting potential credit risks and fraud on our business as usual, you’d probably find us binge-watching Netflix shows, testing out new food spots around town (mostly ordering in to social distance), and chatting about our coming week on our regular Zoom calls. Once COVID subsides, we’re excited to be able to meet and socialize over a meal again.

item.title: Cloud Infra Engineer - Commerce Enablement
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Cloud Infrastructure Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the Commerce Enablement team based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Focusing your efforts on empowering our product engineers to drive their performance to the next level, you’ll take the wheel in ensuring operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, and high availability of the system from an infrastructure point of view. Your infrastructure and standardization designs will not only be implemented for the CE group alone, but throughout the Gojek ecosystem as a whole.

item.title: Campaign & Consumer Engagement Associate - Jakarta
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a high-functioning, dynamic team whose efforts directly impact our user base, this may be the role for you. As our Campaign & Consumer Engagement Associate for the Indo Region team and based in Jakarta, you’ll take the wheel in hacking consumer growth for Gojek in Jakarta. You’ll take the time to deeply understand our consumers’ preferences and concerns, then create consumer segmentation and experimentation programs that fit each segments’ needs. Working closely with the Regional Sales Manager and District Operation Manager you’ll get to drive the innovation process of removing daily frictions from our consumers’ lives through tech-based solutions, delivering a real social impact along the way.

item.title: Business Strategy, Financial Management
item.description: If you’re seeking a good challenge and a chance to take the next leap in your career, this role is for you. In Business Strategy for Financial Management, you’ll be part of a team responsible for allowing a customer to manage their money and linked sources of money. This would include the linked accounts, balances, digital account openings, history, categorisation of expenses, insights and actionable recommendations, default in/out channels for payments. You’ll take charge over problem-solving processes and execute solutions focused on improving demand and growth metrics for the platform. Combining business strategy, customer experience, and behavior analysis, you’ll conduct experiments and execute campaigns that’ll encourage our users to experience the product’s core value as quickly as possible. Throughout this exciting experience, you’ll build relationships with internal and external stakeholders, from product, marketing, research, and operation team among others to meet the fast-paced nature of the financial technology industry.

item.title: Business Strategy Associate Manager - 7184
item.description:
About the Role
We’re looking for talented individuals to join us on our mission to become an indispensable business partner for merchants and to help them succeed and thrive in Indonesia as Business Strategy Associate Manager.
The Merchant lifecycle team acts as the business team for the Merchant Platform product. As a Business Strategy Associate Manager, You will work together with the GTM Core Services Lead and other product/business teams to create a go-to-market strategy for GoBiz App. You need to collaborate closely with the product, sales, marketing, ops team for product rollout and adoption of platform features and/or various use cases hosted by GoBiz App. In your day-to-day execution, You will need to monitor and analyze key metrics to produce insights and take initiatives/propose solutions to enhance the product/business process so that we can provide better services/products for our merchants.

item.title: Business Intelligence Manager - Risk
item.description:
About the Role
As a Business Intelligence Manager in our Risk Data team, you will lead a team of business intelligence analysts responsible for intelligence and data products which empower our sophisticated risk decisions in protecting GoPay and its customers. You will drive strategic directions of Risk BI and solve some of the most impactful and stimulating business problems in the payments space by partnering with Risk, product, engineering, and data science partners. You will work in a fast-paced environment with direct impacts to the business.

item.title: Business Intelligence Analyst - Risk
item.description:
About the Role
As a Business Intelligence Analyst in our Risk Data team, you will develop intelligence and data products which empower our sophisticated risk decisions in protecting GoPay and its customers. You will have the opportunity to work with rich data and partner with Risk, product, engineering, and data science partners to identify and solve some of the most impactful and stimulating business problems in the payments space. You will work in a fast-paced environment with direct impacts to the business.

item.title: Business Intelligence Analyst - Merchant Platform
item.description:
About the Role
As our Business Intelligence Analyst for the Merchant Platform, you’ll collaborate with other cross-functional teams (Product Managers, Business Strategist, Marketing, Research, and Data Science) to find useful business insights within a large amount of data. You’ll assist these teams in setting up success metrics for particular products/features, optimize existing services and systems, and ensure data quality and source of truth availability.
On a daily basis, you’ll process data streams to produce data foundation, analytical dashboards, and product / feature trackers. Here, you'll get a front row seat in understanding how one of the largest Asian SuperApps makes use of its data. Your efforts will help remove highly-complex analytical blockers presented to the team, and contribute to the overall expansion and efficiency of Gojek's Merchant platform.

item.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
item.description:
About the Role
If you’re looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly analytical team who enjoys working with data, look no further. GoClub is a loyalty product that shapes Gojek’s long-term customer loyalty as part of the Loyalty, Partnership & Monetisation (LPM) group. Your mission as a Data Analyst in Goclub is to use data that enhances our understanding about customer’s behaviour that shapes long-term loyalty. You will be involved in various initiatives, such as building data products to support the team, be a steward for data driven business initiatives, and partner with the business team and product team and make great products together. From day one, you will learn and work to solve some of the most challenging initiatives that produce high-value customers!

item.title: Business Intelligence - Financial Services
item.description:
About the Role
In GoTo, we put a really high value on data. To get insight, and knowledge and eventually make a decision. That’s why one of our company values is “Become a Scientist”. As a BI Analyst, you will have tons of data to play with. From voices of customers and transactional information, just to name a few. You will be dealing with dashboards, and reports and even take part in experimentation to determine the best strategy. You will have close interactions with multiple stakeholders within the Insurance team and other teams in GoTo Financials Services.

item.title: Brand Strategy & Planning Lead
item.description:
About the Role
If you have the heart of a scientist and a curiosity of a cat, if you see data not just as numbers but a mean to tell a story, If you believe that there is always a way to solve a problem as long as we have good insights, then you might be the one we are looking for.
As Brand Strategy and Planning Lead for Gojek’s Brand Marketing team, you will get to work with other talented teams in Gojek - from product analyst, Research and Insights, in app and CRM teams - mining insights from internal/external data, which translates into a brand and communication strategy. You will spend a majority of your time diving deep into some of the most challenging analytical problems in the Gojek brand - in the very core of Gojek's vast ecosystem. The cherry on top: you’ll get to be a part of a team that works to create not only the most loved brand but also contributes to a sustainable growth of the Gojek brand.

item.title: Associate IT Internal Auditor
item.description:
About the Role
In GoTo, the growth of our business is continuously challenged by the fast pace of technology development and regulatory changes. In this role, you will be part of the Internal Audit Team based in Indonesia. Focusing heavily on providing assurance by evaluating and improving the control process. you will employ analytical thinking skills, and communication skills, and be able to adapt to a fast phase environment in an effort to deliver the audit successfully. In our humble opinion, the coolest part is your ability to be eloquent in delivering communication with stakeholders and have high enthusiasm for learning.

item.title: Android Engineer - Mapan
item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our next Android Engineer. In this role, you will be an integral player in the Mapan Mobile team based in Jakarta, Indonesia - a team whose efforts are especially catered to aid lower-income users attain additional income through our platform. In collaboration with UX and backend teams, you'll get to build a large-scale, high-performing, fault-tolerant Android app for Gojek, providing simple, easy to use services for our users. With knowledge of the general mobile landscape, current user preferences and trends, and emerging technologies in the mobile engineering field, you'll employ your technical expertise and clean coding skills to deliver tangible solutions that'll bring a positive socioeconomic impact to all who use our app.

item.title: Account Manager (Sumatra) - MokaPOS
item.description:
We are looking for a competent Account Manager to find business opportunities and manage customer relationships in the F&B and Retail industry in Sumatra Area. You’ll be directly responsible for the preservation and expansion of our key customer base.
The ideal candidate will be a candidate who has experience in customer service and sales. We expect you to be a reliable professional, who is able to balance customer orientation and a results-driven approach. Your overarching goal is to identify opportunities with prospects and new clients and build them into profitable long-term relationships.

item.description:

Based in Pontianak, you’ll be part of the East Indonesia Region team that oversees Gojek's merchant partners in the area. You'll play a critical role in executing sales strategy, as well as building and maintaining relationships with merchant partner networks here (including regular visits upon assigned leads!). item.description:
About the Role
Fasten your helmet and climb on board if you’re ready to be our Sales Executive for the Purwokerto region. In this role, you’ll focus your efforts on scouting out potential merchant-partners, boosting merchant acquisition initiatives, and spreading awareness about our Point of Sales system. You’ll go the extra mile to better understand our merchant-partners' concerns and experiences on the field to resolve their pain points, and relay the information you gather to our Product and Business development teams. Your efforts will help enhance our merchant-partners’ daily operations, and better position our platform as the most trusted solution provider in the region and beyond.
